name: GALLERY B&B SUITE
description: A quiet and sunny suite with a private entrance, within walking distance of Ganges. It accommodates 2 comfortably with full kitchen , dining table, spacious bathroom with shower, queen size bed with reading lights, and a private patio with BBQ. Breakfast makings are provided - fresh organic wood-fired naturally-leavened sourdough bread from Francis Bread, also butter, jam, eggs,  milk, coffee and tea.
neighborhood_overview: Our property has gardens, an orchard, a pond and monumental fir trees. It is near the village of Ganges and close to a beach. It is rural yet within walking distance of  galleries, bookstores, cafes, restaurants and lots of music venues.
host_about: Your hosts Nicholas Hunt and Celia Duthie have been married for more than 30 years. We have 2 children.  Much of our life was spent in the book business in Vancouver; now as well as the B&B we have a gallery of fine and landscape art. We love to cook, eat, walk, read, garden, play bridge and travel.

name: Galiano Island Eagles Nest Retreat Cabin - Private
description:
Strictly 4 nights minimum
The cabin is self-contained and private.

If you wish to use the fire place ***bring your own firewood or it can be purchased at the Corner Store or Garage on the island.***

The hot tub is located on a promontory with a very scenic 180 degree view of ocean, other islands and the glaciers of the Olympic mountains in the far distance to the south.
Walk to the beach,Top of the World (15 minutes) with endless trails.
neighborhood_overview: We are secluded and live in a  peaceful environment. There are many trails  around  that will bring you to a scenic view so you decide which adventure you want.
host_about:
Hi, 

My name is Line Marie and I live on Galiano Island, BC.  Bernard and I have been living on Galiano for an average of 30 years and we can't find anywhere like it on earth.  We love sailing, hiking,camping , gardening and exploring.  
I am a mosaic artist and always looking for like minded people.

I have been in the accommodation business  for the last 30 years.   We enjoy people .   

We live in a very serene environment on one of the most scenic property in the Gulf Islands. We have built the house and we would like to host like minded people.  We are asking guests to view, Cowspiracy (it's free on Netflix) before booking with us.


Line Marie and family

name: Cedar Log Home Galiano Island
description: This is a 600 square foot 2 bedroom cabin on Galiano Island.  There is a queen bed and a double bed in the bedrooms.  There is a private bathroom with shower.  Includes a kitchenette.   The house is a milled cedar log home that still gives a faint cedar smell.  No pets.
neighborhood_overview: Access to Galiano Island is by private boat or BC Ferries.  We are located in "midtown" Galiano close to the library, school and fitness centre.  It is 1/2 way between "downtown" Galiano near the ferry terminal where most shops and services are and "uptown" Galiano where the corner store, pub and market is located.

name: Salt Spring Carriage House - The Loft
description: This pet friendly suite is situated in the north end of the island, and a two minute walk to the best swimming at St. Mary Lake, the B&B is a 7 minute drive to Ganges, our main town.  Breakfast is brought to your room daily to enjoy at your leisure.  Adults only.  No children.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is quiet, and well wooded, making it enjoyable and safe for walking some of the local hiking trails.  Lots of wildlife abound, including resident deer and their babies, woodpeckers, eagles, ravens, and other birds.  A two minute walk to St Mary Lake, the largest lake on Salt Spring, it is also close to the popular public access beach for swimming.  If lazing is what you wish, there is a small deck in the private garden surrounding the B&B which many guests have enjoyed, either taking their breakfast out there in the mornings, or enjoying the full sun in the afternoon with a snack and a glass of wine.
host_about: Easy going, like meeting new people, love food, good wine, and having a laugh!

name: Raylia Cottage Farm Stay
description: South Facing, 500 sq. ft cottage on 12 gorgeous acres with flower & org.veg. gardens backing on to Mt. Parke.   Centrally located, 5 minute walk to organic grocer, spa and shops.  Self Catering, quiet, private and and peaceful, 20 min walk to beach.
neighborhood_overview: Great neighbourhood, backing up on Mt. Parke with gorgeous hikes.  15 min. walk to village and summer farmers market.  20 min. walk to gorgeous swimming and kayaking beach! Centrally located on island. Very peaceful and quiet.

name: Magical Ocean Oasis/Wildlife/Birds/Welcome Tray
description:
Autumn/Winter is upon us - Spectacular Private Vacation Suite & Panoramic Ocean Views on 6 park-like acres.
Gorgeous Grand private Vacation Suite with all the Westcoast comforts. Beautifully appointed Suite & Amazing King/Queen luxe beds & linens & amazing Turret living/dining room with & wrap-around deck/bay windows to take in the ever-changing ocean views & park-like acreage - Vintage Cast Iron fireplace to keep you cozy & warm - Beautiful outdoor covered deck-curl up by the fire & star gaze.
neighborhood_overview: Located in beautiful Otter Point, we are 10 mins from the town of Sooke and minutes away from amazing beaches/hiking/kayaking/paddle-boarding/fishing. We are situated above Gordon's Beach which is a short stroll down a country road past some lovely farms/Woodworking & Art galleries.
host_about:
We are delighted to be sharing this magnificent piece of paradise with wonderful guests near & far.  
Having travelled to "almost" 20 different countries we have come to realize the world is not that small after all.
We hope you enjoy this little piece of paradise as much as we do.

name: Wow! Gonzales Beach!! 2 Bedroom!!
description: 30 nights for the price of 21!   Stay in Victoria's most sought after neighbourhood. Whether you are bbqing on the patio, or enjoying a wonderful sleep in the Vera Wang king size bed,  this 1000sf  2 bdrm suite offers all of the comforts of home & is only steps to the beach!
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet!!!     Close to all amenities, everything is a 6 min walk away (groceries, pharmacy, pub, deli, liquor store).   Close to some of the best walking, running and riding routes in the world!  Walking distance to the famous Chinese and Ross Bay Cemetaries.    And of course, very close to the water!
host_about:
Passionate about life!   Love Victoria, and Love to travel!  Kyla (my fiance)  and I are healthy, fun loving people.  Enjoy doing anything that is different and adventurous.  

Our listings are all our own,  which we take great pride in!   And we love sharing them with fellow travellers!   We try to provide the same experience we would want when we travel!  :))

This past year we did the amazing Trans-Siberian railway and Mongolia,  and then later in the year we did a pre-baby trip to Portugal and Spain.     Bali is a favourite for us to unwind and find our inner peace!  We are busy bodies at home,  loving live theatre, yoga, training,  and being tourists in our own town!   Looking forward to sharing our city with you!

name: Gonzales Beach Character Home
description: Our many-bedroomed, sunny and cheerful, family-friendly home is situated in the leafy Fairfield area of Victoria, 1 short block away from 2 beautiful beaches! Our home sleeps 12; it has a lovely south-facing balcony, library, play-room, and open kitchen/dining area, conveniently located only 5 minutes from downtown and a short, 2 block walk from shopping and restaurants.
neighborhood_overview:
Our home is less than a minutes walk from sandy Gonzales Beach and 2 minutes from the Dallas Road seaside walkway with views of the Olympic mountains across the Strait of Juan de Fuca.
The Fairfield area is a neighbourhood filled with mature trees and many lovely gardens, including the famous Abkhazi gardens and the extensive gardens of Government House.
Ross Bay pub, Starbucks, sushi restaurant, pizza, liquor store, pharmacy, and groceries are all a 5 minute walk away.
host_about: I am an Anglican priest, the Rector of St. Barnabas Church near Fernwood in Victoria. I am married to Jasmin and we have 4 children aged 5-15 years.

name: Salt Spring Waterfront
description:
This bright and cozy WATERFRONT vacation spot offers 2 bedrooms with comfortable queen beds, two flat screen TVs and two electric fireplaces.
A full washroom and an eating area. There are two private decks over looking Long Harbour!

*****PLEASE NOTE: children over 7 months old are counted as a guest and will be charged the extra guest fee of $50 and we have a 4 guest limit. Infants, up to 6 months are free and not counted as a guest.
neighborhood_overview:
Our temperate climate, beautiful parks, beach accesses, hiking trails and events make any season a great time to visit.
Enjoy Salt Spring Studio Tour, shops and restaurants located around the island.
Experience the surrounding water by kayak, canoe or sailboat. Try your luck fishing!
Don't miss out on Ruckle Provincial Park, Mount Maxwell Park and taking a dip in St. Mary Lake.
There are many delightful surprises to be discovered here!
host_about: Originally from White Rock B.C. We came for a visit to Salt Spring Island in the Spring of 2013...fell in love with this little piece of paradise and found this place right on the ocean and thought it would be a great for a guest suite! Every day is fantastic here, rain, snow and especially the sun! Waterfront, peaceful, it doesn't get any better than this! Come and visit!

name: "The Nutcracker Suite"
description:
This is a fully supplied suite on the 1st. floor of a traditional West Coast cedar built two story house nestled near the end of a no-through road in the beautiful Saanich area. 1090 Mina Ave. in Victoria, BC. Very private.
A perfect quiet location as if in a forest! 10 minute drive to Victoria centre, the Butchart Gardens, Hwy #1 North Island, also highway #17 to ferry terminals to Swartz Bay Vancouver and Anacortes Ferry to USA. The Coho ferry to Port Angeles at Inner Harbour downtown.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbors are quiet and respectful in the area.
host_about:
We are 2 adults from Victoria, BC Canada. Margaret Anne (71) years old) and Willem Zaalberg (77 years old). Willem was originally born in Leiden Holland and Margaret Anne born in Norway and now Canadian citizens  Both recently retired. We have spent our working lives in people related professions.
Bill has been in the music and entertainment industry and Marg has spent a life-long career as a pediatric registered nurse. We would like to continue to associate with people during our retirement by welcoming guests into our spacious self contained suite for any length of timewhen staying in the Victoria, BC area.

name: Coles Bay Vacation Retreat / Beaches, Golf, Trails
description: Our Coles Bay Suite is a relaxing getaway to the country set up for a 6 night minimum stay. Sleeps up to 6 people with 2 bedrooms (queen size beds), bathroom with bath/shower, half bathroom (sink and toilet with towels & soap) outside of the suite but close by, living room with queen size Lazy Boy sleeping sofa.  Full kitchen & laundry facilities in the suite. Relax outside with a concrete deck area, table chairs, loungers & 6 burner gas barbecue. A home away from home!
neighborhood_overview: Coles Bay Vacation Retreat is located in the the countryside with a beach a 5 minute walk away and a golf course across the street. The property is on a third of an acre so it's spacious and private for everyone. The neighborhood is quiet and beautiful.The town of Sidney is 5 miles away, Victoria International Airport 3 miles away and Butchart Gardens, a favorite local attraction is a 15 minute drive. Victoria is 25 minutes by car.
host_about:
My husband Howie and I will be your hosts. My mother, Jan and step father, Maurie Turner completed building their home in 1978. This was intended to be and became their dream home. 

They have always wanted to create a bed and breakfast but never got around to it. My mother, unfortunately passed away in 2014. We are now full-filling her wish to open her home to guests from around the world to share and enjoy the beauty of Vancouver Island that we have had the privilege to call home for over 50 years.  

We are in a two phase process. We are opening the first suite in our house at the moment and will have an 1100 sq ft. guest home on the property available by spring. We are continuing my mother's love of flower gardens to create an inviting yard to sit and relax on a warm summer evening or pull a ripe apple or plum from my mother's fruit trees. 

I owned and rented a guest cottage in California back in the '80's and had so much fun and many wonderful memories with our clients. We look forward to meeting you and creating new ones!

name: Cozy 2 BD Near Saxe Point Park
description: Welcome home to your cozy 2BD basement suite with a warm electric fireplace, your own private patio, a full kitchen, in-suite washer and dryer, and off street parking. Your suite has a private entrance with a keypad lock box and is entirely self-contained. Walk or bike to nearby beaches and an excellent recreation centre with pool and gym. A lovely, quiet neighbourhood just minutes from downtown Victoria and CFB and a 20 minute bus ride to UVIC.
neighborhood_overview: Our home is in a lovely, quiet, well cared for neighbourhood.  We're just a two-minute walk from beautiful Saxe Point Park with picturesque beaches, sweeping views of the Pacific, and even an off-leash walking trail!  A five-minute walk in the other direction takes you to McCauley Point Park, a favourite for birdwatchers, beachcombers, hikers and dog walkers.  Esquimalt Recreation Centre, just three block away, has a fantastic water park for kids, and a great pool and gym. We’re just minutes away by bus, bike or car from the great attractions, events, restaurants and entertainment in downtown Victoria.  Working or on course at CFB Esquimalt?  The base is just around the corner!
host_about: We are a 'middle-aged' couple with a small dog. We like to explore, walk, investigate interesting local markets and restaurants, play cards, swim in lakes or the ocean, and golf (well, one of us, anyway). We LOVE listening to live music - especially at small, intimate venues or outdoors. We love our home on Vancouver Island and sharing insider tips with visitors.  We also love to travel and experience new places and cultures.

name: 1 Large room with TV and Fridge
description: This is a comfortable 11x12 man's bedroom with shared bathroom. It has a full Queen bed along with a dresser, cupboards and a mini fridge.  A computer desk and shared washroom. We are located just a few blocks to Uptown Mall and an easy walk to Swan Creek and Christmas Hill Nature Sanctuary.
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is usually very lush and green with many trees and flowers and birds that come to our sundeck. We are only a few blocks from Uptown Mall, Whole Foods, Walmart with Medical Clinic, Tim Hortons Donut Shop, Subway Sandwiches, Shoppers Drug Mart and Saanich Plaza with the Medical Clinic. You can walk on the Galloping Goose trail to Swan Lake with many different birds and flowers along the way.
host_about:
Helping people learn about Victoria, healthy living, organic food, trying some gluten free recipes and others, plus vitamins.  I like to cook healthy food to keep me energetic.  We love to learn about all the corners of the world over the dinner table. 

We currently have several rooms for homestay students.  Please book as soon as possible. The rooms book up very quickly because the students tell their friends or bring them over and they want to move in as well.

We are only 3 minutes walk down two blocks to the bus, and it is only 10 minutes on the bus to town. We have a beautiful 45 minute hike around Swan Lake just outside our front window. We have shopping within walking distance, a couple of blocks down at the brand new Uptown Mall.

 Karen

name: Rain Lily Cottage on Galiano Island
description: Rain Lily Cottage is rustic getaway on beautiful Galiano island located just a few minutes walk from the Sturdies Bay ferry terminal - no need to bring your vehicle.  A retreat from the busy life, your cottage by the forest is just a short walk to local beaches, and close to the amenities that Galiano has to offer. It has sleeping room for 4, features one bedroom, kitchen, full bathroom, sofa bed in the living area and a covered back deck for enjoying the outdoors, rain or shine.
neighborhood_overview:
The cottage is in an ideal location for people who want to leave their cars behind and come as foot passengers on the ferry. We are just a few minutes walk from the ferry terminal, and a one minute walk from the hub of the Sturdies Bay shops and restaurants including the bakery, Babes in the Woods, Oxeye, Manzanitaville, the Galiano Inn, the Galiano Bookstore and more.

The Hummingbird Pub, Daystar Market, Galiano Trading, The Corner Store and the Galiano South End Hall are all about 2 km from the cottage and accessible along the Sturdies Bay walking trail. The Saturday Market at the Lions Field (May - October) is about a 15 minute walk from the cottage. Various beaches are located within short walking distance.
host_about: I grew up in BC, spent many years travelling and living in other parts of the world, and eventually moved back to Galiano - one of the most beautiful places on earth!

name: Magical Ocean Views @ Ocean Oasis & Wildlife/Birds
description:
Autumn/Winter is upon us & it is a spectacular time of year. Breathtaking Ocean Views & Gorgeous Suite with all the comforts of home in a Magical setting.
Ocean Oasis is perfectly situated overlooking the Ocean & Majestic snow-capped Olympic Mountains & 6 park-like walkable acres. A perfect get-away for guests seeking an escape to the country surrounded by nature in a peaceful Ocean-Side setting.
Our Rates include a self-catering local breakfast/brunch welcome basket
"In Suite upon arrival."
neighborhood_overview: Otter Point is located 10 minutes from the town of Sooke. We are sun-soaked in the summer months and offer excellent storm-watching in the off-season. There is no shortage of sea-watching with the abundant fishing, sailing and surfing that happens in the Strait of Juan de Fuca. Award-winning eateries, Bistro's (we love Stick in the Mud) and boutique shopping are a 10-minute drive away. Whiffin Spit Park nestled near Sooke Harbour offers serene beach walks and gorgeous scenery.
host_about:
We are delighted to be sharing this magnificent piece of paradise with wonderful guests near & far.  
Having travelled to "almost" 20 different countries we have come to realize the world is not that small after all.
We hope you enjoy this little piece of paradise as much as we do.

name: Your island home away from home 4 BR suite
description: We are on a peninsula which is semi-rural, in the midst of farmland, small villages, beaches and mountains.  We are surrounded by lush flower gardens and hummingbirds almost year round.  Fresh fruit and produce are plentiful from many gardens. Note: From Sept 15 - April 15 stay 3 days or more get next day free.
neighborhood_overview:
We are in the small village of Saanichton, with bank, pharmacy, post office and grocery store. Also medical clinic just down the street.
There is a summer market just around the corner on Saturday mornings and a Thursday evening street market in Sidney, 10 minutes away.
We are on a peninsula so there are beaches and water sports, i.e., kayaking and paddle boarding, very close by.
host_about: We are originally from Georgia in the United States.  We are retired, parents of 4 adult children and 12 grandchildren.   We love being outdoors exercising, gardening, hiking, kayaking.  We have lived here for 30 years and have travelled to many places with our children through the years.  Our favorite would have to be Vanuatu where we spent 6 months in 1994.

name: FANTASTIC!! JUBILEE 4 BDRM
description: 30 nights for the price of 21!. Come and Enjoy our resident Oak Trees from our 2200 sf 4 bedroom house.  With 2 Master bedrooms,  we combined island reclaimed finishing with the most modern conveniences.  I'm sure you will love it as much as we do!
neighborhood_overview: We are one block from the Jubilee Hospital.  Central to everything.  6 minutes to downtown.  3 minutes to all amenities.
host_about:
Passionate about life!   Love Victoria, and Love to travel!  Kyla (my fiance)  and I are healthy, fun loving people.  Enjoy doing anything that is different and adventurous.  

Our listings are all our own,  which we take great pride in!   And we love sharing them with fellow travellers!   We try to provide the same experience we would want when we travel!  :))

This past year we did the amazing Trans-Siberian railway and Mongolia,  and then later in the year we did a pre-baby trip to Portugal and Spain.     Bali is a favourite for us to unwind and find our inner peace!  We are busy bodies at home,  loving live theatre, yoga, training,  and being tourists in our own town!   Looking forward to sharing our city with you!

name: Southey Point beach front accommodation
description: Watch the Bald Eagles soar and the sea otters swim from this beautiful guest accommodation. Fantastic sweeping views down the Trincomali Channel and surrounding Gulf Islands. Property situated ocean front with stairs to the beach. Quiet and private with a full deck to watch nature at it's best. A place to explore the gardens and beaches. Suite features full bathroom/fridge and bar sink area. Queen bed and expansive deck overlooking the ocean. Continental breakfast supplied.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet and pastoral island that has been known to re-store your soul! Lovely driveway through woods, pond area and delightful gardens on 3 acres. Sunset viewing beach within walking distance. 20 minute drive to Ganges to enjoy the local scene, shopping, dining, and galleries.
host_about: Active retired couple. Just out exploring the world.

name: Garden Retreat/ Full Kitchen / King Bed   00036281
description:
You will love this little haven in the peaceful, neighborhood of
James Bay.

​This private cottage is nestled in a calm oasis in the center of Victoria's Historic James Bay neighborhood. It has a full bedroom with a king-size bed, a living room, and a fully equipped kitchen.

When there are extra visitors, the couch in the living room can be converted into a fold-out bed with a beautiful memory foam mattress, its own cushions, and a duvet.
neighborhood_overview:
The entire James Bay is unique.

the distinctive homes, the wide range of gardens, the close proximity to the seaside, attractions, and downtown Victoria

The neighbourhood is also fairly eclectic and safe, which makes it great for strolling.

Fisherman's Wharf, the Museum, the Capitol Building, Beacon Hill Park, the Inner Harbour Empress Hotel, and downtown can all be reached on foot from our location.

To show you Victoria and the neighbouring locations, we also have a variety of nearby transit options and tour companies.

Pedicabs, horse-drawn carriages, and bike rentals are also easily accessible and close by.
host_about:
Welcome to my world. 
I am a traveler and in early 2023 I rented a campervan in Europe with my two Havanese pups, Charlie Brown and Lucy and drove almost 12,000 kms.
I have owned my home for over 43 years and I love sharing with other travelers.
It has been a joy to meet people from all over the world.
These days I hike almost daily as we have amazing hiking trails here. If you have any questions I am happy to chat

name: Ocean Front Beach & Dock, 1 Br + Murphy - Victoria
description: Stay waterfront on Brentwood Bay with outstanding views of the ocean by booking this 1 bedroom suite! Go kayaking or fishing, spot orca whales and make use of the private dock and beach. Unwind with a hot tub at night as you admire the ocean side sunset. 5-star spa, pub & restaurant next door and a few extra minutes gets you to local shops and the famous Butchart Gardens. Come by boat, car, or bike - and charter one of our boats with and skipper to show you ocean paradise.
neighborhood_overview:
Brentwood Bay is a lovely village with all of the basic amenities available- excellent restaurants (three on the waterfront), pubs, bakery, butcher, grocery store, pharmacy, gift shops, coffee shops, yoga studio, a five star spa, liquor store and cold beer and wine shop to name a few.

There are fantastic beaches, hikes, water-side walks, fishing, water sports, world-class scuba diving (complete with local scuba company), the famous Butchart Gardens, Butterfly Gardens, local eco tours, and more. Other local activities include paddle board yoga, kayak tours, and glass-bottom boat eco tours...to name only a few.

Brentwood Bay is only 20 minutes from Victoria but gives you easier access to the amazing outdoor adventures that Vancouver Island has to offer.
host_about:
I live in Brentwood Bay, British Columbia, with my husband, Dallas, and two daughters. We are an active bunch and share a love of food, fun, and adventures with family and friends. 

As a first generation Canadian, travelling is in my genes. We love to meet new people, explore new places, and introduce others to the amazing island on which we live.

name: Family Friendly Suite In Cordova Bay
description:
•Contemporary, bright walk out suite in Cordova Bay

•King bed, Double Sofabed, Small Single for children 12 and under + Crib

•In Suite Laundry and Full Kitchen with Dishwasher

•Short walk to Matticks Farm Shopping Center, Grocery Store, the Beach House Restaurant and Cordova Bay Golf Course

•15-20mins to downtown Victoria, Airport and Sidney
neighborhood_overview: We are on a quiet no through street just off of Cordova Bay Road. Mere steps from Matticks Farm, dining, cold beer and wine store,  ice cream parlour, grocery store, boutique shopping and 2 golf courses. Walking distance to The Beach House Restaurant. We are right beside Lochside bike path that goes from the ferry terminal to downtown Victoria!  The beach is a few blocks away! 15 min drive to downtown Victoria. A quick drive to UVIC, Mount Douglas Park , Elk/Beaver Lake, Burchard Gardens, The Airport, Sidney and many wineries!
host_about:
Hi, my name is Vashti! I've lived in Victoria for 16 years with my husband and children. Originally from Vancouver BC, we moved to Victoria for the birth of our first child. 
We  have a shy & quiet Border Collie rescue dog and 2 kitties:)

My interests are thrift shopping for vintage treasures, riding motorcycles,  baking, and weight lifting~

name: Colwood Cosy Cottage
description: Located in the heart of Colwood, our One bedroom cottage is the perfect home away from home. Full kitchen, microwave, full bath, W/D, cableTV, WiFI, DVD player, movies, books, game’s, private parking, patio, large private yard with outdoor propane fire pit & Bbq. Use at own risk. The cottage has a queen size bed in the bedroom and a dbl pullout couch in the main living area that can be used for extra guest or kids. Hidden Beauty.
neighborhood_overview:
We are a 2 minute drive or short walk to Esquimalt Lagoon Ocean Front, Bird Sanctuary, Royal Bay, Royal Roads University, Hatley Castle, Fort Rodd Hill, Pacific Landing, an amazing little local bakery w/fresh local farm eggs and much more. Very friendly neighbourhood located in the heart of Colwood. Stunning parks and recreation. Great running & walking trails including the galloping goose trail.
The guest book provided has some directions & suggestions in it, but feel free to come and ask either one of us and we will be happy to help out.
host_about:
Welcome Guest’s. 
Adam and I are hard working go getter’s that love to laugh. We enjoy life and our life together, family, friend’s, and the great out door’s. 
Airbnb is a wonderful experience, and we are alway’s looking forward to seeing what’s next. We love Vancouver Island.

name: Bear Mountain Getaway
description: Our place is close to restaurants and dining. Bear Mountain Getaway offers residents and guests alike, resort living at its finest. Victoria, BC is a sophisticated and charming city with world class recreational opportunities and a year round temperate climate. Visit Bear Mountain Getaway, in its idyllic natural setting, just minutes from downtown Victoria, BC for your next relaxing getaway complete with golf, tennis, and cycling.
neighborhood_overview:
Friendly, well lit, safe neighbourhood, offering southern exposed out door patio area.
It is a five minute walk to the Westin Hotel were you can enjoy 36 holes of world class golf, hiking trails, clay tennis courts, heated out door pool, hot tub, fitness centre, down hill biking trails, fine food, liquor & grocery store, and spa.
host_about: I enjoy the opportunity to host visitors to our beautiful suite located in the prestigious Bear Mountain Golf and Tennis Resort.  Bear Mountain Getaway is located within walking distance of posh neighborhoods, restaurants, spa, golf resort, recreational pool and fitness.  Your stay with us includes a complimentary bottle of wine, chocolates, and specialty soaps.

name: Cozy converted Barn near Orchard
description:
Our space is located close to the airport and BC ferry terminals. The Butchart gardens (a top tourist attraction), hiking trails and shopping are less than 10 minutes away. There is easy access to main highways and downtown Victoria is only a 15 minute drive. . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).

We speak English, French & ASL.
neighborhood_overview:
Located on a quiet road in a rural neighbourhood. Elk Lake is within walking distance and offers 10km of walking trails. This accommodation is located in an area that has many small farms with fresh fruit and vegetables for sale along the road. It is also popular for horse back riding.
There are so many places to go close by for any kind of activity.
Kayaking, hiking, shopping , tourist attractions, and just relaxing in the beach.
host_about:
Hello,
I am from Victoria Canada. I love to travel and be outside in nature.

name: Sooke Cedar House - Everett Suite
description: The Everett Suite is nearly 600 sq. ft of "Gorgeous". Bright room with lots of windows. Hand crafted furniture by a master craftsman, are evident throughout this room.  From the two sided wood burning fireplace, to the cedar bathroom, to the spectacular King size sleigh bed.  A large sitting area, private jacuzzi tub, well equipped kitchenette (including: fridge, microwave/convection oven, toaster, kettle, coffee french press) . Also 32" cable TV, WIFI and access to a lit and covered BBQ.
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to one of the regions most beautiful Vacation Rentals, where country elegance meets rugged coastal beauty.  Located west on the Pacific Marine Coastal Highway.  9 minute drive to the town of Sooke that has all of your amenities, 35 minutes from Victoria and about one hour away from YYJ airport.
host_about:
Welcome to my one acre garden paradise in Sooke BC, approximately 35 minutes away from Victoria, and just under an hour from the BC Ferries and YYJ airport.  I have 4 adult children, and 3 grand children (so far). My past experiences included sales & marketing, tourism, restaurant ownership and garden maintenance. 

My Debbie and I purchased this property in 2016 and she created what you see here today sadly she passed away in February 2020.

description: The Aletheia Suite is nearly 800 Sq ft of "Wow".  The King size hand crafted four poster luxurious bed never ceases to amaze. Two sided wood burning fire place, extra large jacuzzi tub, WIFI and flat screen TV. Private sitting area and well equipped kitchenette (including: fridge, microwave/convection oven, hot plate, toaster, kettle, french press). Outside your private entrance is a large covered patio that overlooks english gardens complete with fountains, arbours, ponds and lit covered BBQ.
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to one of the regions most beautiful Vacation Rentals, where country elegance meets rugged coastal beauty.  Located west on the Pacific Marine Coastal Highway.  9 minute drive to the town of Sooke that has all of your amenities, 35 minutes from Victoria and about one hour away from YYJ airport.
host_about:
Welcome to my one acre garden paradise in Sooke BC, approximately 35 minutes away from Victoria, and just under an hour from the BC Ferries and YYJ airport.  I have 4 adult children, and 3 grand children (so far). My past experiences included sales & marketing, tourism, restaurant ownership and garden maintenance. 

My Debbie and I purchased this property in 2016 and she created what you see here today sadly she passed away in February 2020.

name: Matheson Lake Guest House
description: Come stay at Matheson Lake Guest House where you will enjoy a country setting nestled on 10 private acres with scenic mountain views! Minutes away from Matheson Lake Park, Pedder Bay Marina, and the MyChosen Cafe. Suits 4 comfortably, fully furnished, smoking outdoors ok and pet friendly. We do require a $30 pet fee, please add at the time of booking your reservation.
neighborhood_overview:
Matheson Lake is minutes away and a popular spot to hike and swim. The Galloping Goose Trail connects from the parking lot and you can bike to Sooke and as far as historic Leechtown.

Walk or drive to Pedder Bay Marina and grab a Starbucks coffee and enjoy a stroll along the docks where you will see various birds and sea life. Power boat and kayak rentals are available as well as fishing charters for hire.

During the warmer months the community of Metchosin holds farmers markets, craft fairs, art shows and festivals that are always fun to check out.

One of Metchosin's greatest features are it's beautiful beaches and lush forest walks. Visit the CRD website for more details.

Metchosin has a small town core where you will find a general store, a cozy coffee shop, town hall, horse back riding ring, community house and best of all the MyChosen Cafe! This restaurant is well worth the visit! Eat in or have their pizza kitchen deliver the best p

name: Maple Lodge Cottage-Pet Friendly inquire
description: This is a quaint studio on the edge of the woods. You will have the entire cabin to yourself with a beautiful view of Saltspring Island and Trincomali Channel. This Cabin is a wonderful retreat for any couple and can easily accommodate a small child. We will also accept small well behaved pets for an additional $25 per night. If you do bring your animal, please leave the extra fee on the table before you check out. Thank-you.
neighborhood_overview: We are located mid-island approximately 13 km or 20 minutes from the Sturdies Bay ferry dock. It is a 20 minute walk to the beach access at Ganner Beach and several unique artists studios. Galiano has many wonderful hikes and beaches to explore. It is also home to a variety of eateries as well as one of Canada's premier farm-to-table restaurants.
host_about: I am a long time resident of Galiano Island. I run a custom sawmill business providing lumber for local builders. I am a friendly person who has raised his family on this island and love the natural beauty of this magical place.

name: Wheelhouse Suite on Salt Spring Island
description: Stay in our private suite across the road from a lake on beautiful Salt Spring Island. You will have your own patio with propane fireplace. Lakeside walks are just down the road. Forest walks and ocean beaches are only a short drive. The village of Ganges is an 8 minute drive away. Pets welcome by request only. Additional cleaning fee of $50 for pets.
neighborhood_overview: We are located on a beautiful, quiet road, which runs for a kilometre beside a lake, perfect for a walk without even getting in your car. We are close to hiking, fresh and saltwater swimming and great dog walking trails. We are just a few minutes drive from the village of Ganges.
host_about: Anne and John are a semi-retired couple who have lived on Salt Spring Island since 1982. We started and ran our own business for over 30 years, selling it in 2016. We enjoy an active lifestyle with some running, cycling and lots of dog-walking. John enjoys woodwork and spends as much time as he can in his workshop. Anne works part time as a business coach. We have several grandchildren and enjoy lots of time with our extended family.

name: Historic City Hall
description:
Due to new provincial legislation, we can not rent out our condo for less than 91 days.

Located in the heart of Victoria, this one-bedroom, plus den (no door), one-bathroom condo is a perfect place to stay when visiting Victoria. With south-west facing full height windows and balcony, enjoy views of the city and spectacular Victoria sunsets. Walk to everything downtown Victoria – restaurants, the Inner Harbour, China Town, the theatres, the arena, Centennial Square, markets and shopping.
host_about: Hi! We're Carolyn, Marlene and Kevin.  Kevin has called Victoria home all his life but Carolyn and Marlene were once from Winnipeg!  We all three love love love Victoria and the Island and are so thankful to live in such an amazing part of Canada.  We also love to travel and meet new people.  We hope you enjoy our beautiful city as much as we do.

name: Sea of Serenity - Magical Views & welcome tray
description:
Breathtaking Ocean & Snow-Capped Mountain Views!
Stunning Private Suite with amazing views from the luxury of your large cozy private Suite. Sea of Serenity is a beautiful open-plan Suite with panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean & the Majestic Olympic Mountains &
6+park-like walkable acres. Luxurious Gorgeous King bed & beautiful linens & cozy throws.
Lovely spa-inspired bathroom with walk in shower & bench seat & heated floors & Salt Spring soaps & Rates include a welcome/breakfast basket.
neighborhood_overview: Located in beautiful Otter Point, we are 10 mins from the town of Sooke and minutes away from world renowned beaches/hiking/kayaking/paddle-boarding/fishing and so so much more. We are situated above Gordon's Beach which is a short stroll down a country road past some lovely farms and art galleries.
host_about:
We are delighted to be sharing this magnificent piece of paradise with wonderful guests near & far.  
Having travelled to "almost" 20 different countries we have come to realize the world is not that small after all.
We hope you enjoy this little piece of paradise as much as we do.

name: Cozy South End Room - Galiano Island
description: Bright converted garage with separate entrance nestled between the Bluffs and Mount Galiano. Enjoy a hot beverage, tea or coffee, or have a cold drink from your bar fridge while you wait for your BBQ. Your private deck overlooks a meadow perfect to enjoy a re-heated meal from the local restaurants. You are very welcome to use our fenced yard. Access to magnificent Mount Galiano is only minutes away! Your rural home on “The Gem of the Gulf Islands” is perfect for 2 adults plus a smaller teenager.
neighborhood_overview:
We are located around 6km from “down town” Sturdies Bay and the ferry terminal and 2.5km from stores, shops, food carts and “The Pub”. Restaurants can be found at Sturdies Bay or Montague Harbor (both ~6km).

Our place provides easy access to a public beach (5min walk) and view points to take in the serene beauty of Active Pass with its wildlife, such as eagles, seals, killer whales, Humming birds or to watch the ferries go by.

Different access points to trails taking you up to breathtaking Mount Galiano or the Bluffs are only minutes away!

For bicycle friends, Galiano Island is safe for biking, but unfortunately is very hilly. However the paved road to our place is one of the easiest for biking on Galiano.

name: The Wilder Woods Cottage
description: Quiet and cozy space close to town. This sweet cottage has everything you will need for a wonderful stay on Salt Spring Island. Comfy couch with hide a bed, outdoor fire pit. This is our actual home that we can rent out for just a few months out of the year. This is a wonderful safe rural area with my parents are right next door but you have privacy. Pool available from June 1st-September 1st.
neighborhood_overview: Very central to the Island, with a great community of neighbours. location right on the Island's main transportation road (Fulford Ganges) with the bus line. If you enjoy walking there is a wonderful path you can take all the way to town. As you walk down the path you can stop to visit a local winery, eat at Salt Spring Wild Cider down the street, have a slice of pizza or shop at our local cold beer and wine store.
host_about: I love to travel and meet new people. I also love my home. I feel very fortunate every time I return from a trip to this beautiful Island. I spend as much time outside as I can with our girl named Laila who is 7 years old. By profession I am a photographer and musician. I am really into music, Languages + yoga.

name: Deluxe Room, Ensuite Bathroom & Full Breakfast
description: Our Library Room with ensuite bathroom includes a full breakfast with different menu choices. Short drives to parks, art and culture, country views, restaurants and dining, and the beach. You’ll love our place because of the picturesque quiet country setting, closeness to beaches (one is a 5 minute walk), airport, ferries, Butchart Gardens, Sidney and Victoria.
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is in the country close to Coles Bay beach. Quiet, secluded with many areas to go for a stroll, power walk or run. The golf course is across the street from us so we are surrounded mostly by trees, lawns and rural vistas.
We have many wild birds, bunnies and deer that visit the property completing that country feeling.
host_about:
My husband Howie and I will be your hosts. My mother, Jan and step father, Maurie Turner completed building their home in 1978. This was intended to be and became their dream home. 

They have always wanted to create a bed and breakfast but never got around to it. My mother, unfortunately passed away in 2014. We are now full-filling her wish to open her home to guests from around the world to share and enjoy the beauty of Vancouver Island that we have had the privilege to call home for over 50 years.  

We are in a two phase process. We are opening the first suite in our house at the moment and will have an 1100 sq ft. guest home on the property available by spring. We are continuing my mother's love of flower gardens to create an inviting yard to sit and relax on a warm summer evening or pull a ripe apple or plum from my mother's fruit trees. 

I owned and rented a guest cottage in California back in the '80's and had so much fun and many wonderful memories with our clients. We look forward to meeting you and creating new ones!

name: Avatar - Oceanfront Luxury Cottage by Eagle Reach
description:
Our property is brand new in July 2017. Decorated to an extremely high quality standard. The entire property is available and comfortably sleeps up to six people. There is an electric vehicle charger at the property.

See our eaglereach Wordpress site for more information or follow us at Eagle Reach - West Coast Cottages.
neighborhood_overview: Port Renfrew is very special. Eagle Reach is perfectly located to be a base for your outdoor adventures. The local beaches and forest hikes are particular treats and you can take a fishing charter out into the Pacific waters.  Surfing is available on several nearby beaches and you can watch the weather roll by from the comfort of the balcony or living room. Local restaurants and The Renfrew Pub offer a range of dining options.
host_about: Rob and Heather live in Victoria, BC.   We are both engineers with attention to detail and quality we also have a keen interest in the environment.  We love British Columbia and we want to help to protect the beautiful West Coast environment.  For every booking that we take we make a donation to the Ancient Forest Alliance in support of their work to protect the landscape in this area.  We are also keen to highlight the work of local artists whose work can be enjoyed in our home.

name: 4 Bedroom House near Lagoon
description:
Welcome to a homey place near Lagoon in Victoria's beautiful Colwood area.
Colwood earned top marks as one of the top 2 safest & best places in BC, the 4th best place in Canada to retire. Spacious place at the cul-de-sac.Quiet, serene setting, beautiful front garden, partially lagoon view.4 bedrooms (2bedrooms are connected) on the 2nd floor with quality beds and open style common area with a equipped kitchen. Nice deck with a patio set accessible from the kitchen and one of the bedrooms.
neighborhood_overview:
A saltwater lagoon located at the base of the Royal Roads property, next to the Fort Rodd Hill / Fisgard Lighthouse National Historic Sites and a view across Esquimalt Harbour at Dockyard.
Birding at Esquimalt Lagoon. Do not forget to look up too. You may sight a Belted Kingfisher sitting quietly on a branch and, either stalking the shorelines or perched high in the evergreens, you may see a number of Great Blue Herons.
host_about:
Hello everyone.

My name is Liza.  I have a passion for travel and hospitality. My husband and I  traveled to a little more than 25% of the world.  I  love meeting new people. I have been hosting  and helping hosts on Airbnb for over a decade and I always respect each of my guests and I expect the same from my you.

name: Cozy Gorge retreat
description:
Enjoy a good night’s sleep in a quiet neighbourhood close to downtown Victoria. Each morning we provide a delicious self-serve breakfast which includes coffee, tea, homemade granola, and yogurt.

Located near Uptown Mall, or walk along the scenic Gorge Waterway. Downtown is a 40 minute walk away or 10 minutes by local transit bus.

We have a lovely backyard where you can enjoy your morning.

We have 2 cats and a young dog.

We look forward to hosting you!
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighbourhood from the 1930's. Close to the beautiful Gorge walkway.  Close to Tillicum Mall, Silver city theatre, and Uptown Mall.
host_about: I have lived in Victoria for the past 30 years, and in this house for 26 years.  I am employed by the Greater Victoria School district and currently work in a local school.  I enjoy walking and gardening.  During the summer months I love to take very long walks, last year I walked 600 km in Portugal and Spain.  I love meeting people from all over the world.

name: Architect Designed And Decorated Waterfront House
description: An architectural gem. Original design features of the house remain, combined with the spectacular view of the ocean, garden and forest, makes this a very special property. It is furnished to ensure a comfortable and relaxing vacation for couples or families. Relax on the deck, enjoy the wood burning fireplace, or walk down to the waterfront. Try fishing or swimming off the rocks, spotting eagles, seals and whales from the waterfront. Victoria is only a short drive away.
host_about:
We are from Ontario, but we have been in the BC area for about 3 years now with  work.   We loves to travel.   We enjoy learning about different cultures.
We enjoy good cuisine and really enjoy cooking. We  have a vacation rental on Vancouver island, in E Sooke.  We enjoy hiking, biking, kayaking.  We really enjoy the outdoors.

name: Oceanfront Black Otter Cove w/hot tub
description: Gorgeous ocean suite located just 45 minutes from Victoria.  The perfect base to explore Canada's South Pacific... hiking, beach combing, Victoria, Pedder Bay, kayaking, Whiffin Spit, storm watching, Hatley Castle, Butchart Gardens and more!  Here you can relax, recharge, unwind and enjoy all of the wonders of Southern VI.  Private suite with full kitchen, bathroom, own entrance, covered deck, bbq, wood fireplace & hot-tub. NOTE: recent BC legislation regarding STR do not apply to our listing.
neighborhood_overview: East Sooke is dubbed "Nature's Gallery".  Located only 45 minutes from downtown Victoria it is a world apart!  Our large 1+ acre property with Ocean front views and shell/rocky beach access (somewhat tide dependant) will leave you breathless!
host_about:
After retiring from 12 years owning & operating a successful fishing lodge I have now set my sights on this gorgeous spot and vacation rental here in SPECTACULAR  East Sooke!  Where Victoria meets the Wild West Coast.  Assisting me with this new venture is my handsome son Colton and our useless bulldogs Hank and Hazel.  
We are really looking forward to  meeting new friends through Black Otter Cove!!

name: Modern loft apartment on Portage Inlet
description: Modern self contained loft suite with private entrance. Fully equipped kitchen, dishwasher, full size fridge with ice maker, coffee maker. Bathroom has rain shower and comes equipped with towels, soap, shampoo and hair dryer. Washer and dryer in suite. Living area has comfy hideabed, propane fireplace, flat screen tv, internet and cable. Loft has super comfy memory foam queen bed. Outdoor space has large dec with patio set for outdoor dining and a front lawn with a palm tree. Ample free parking.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet no through street, one street from rail trail and close to public kayak launch. Large park at end of street on Portage Inlet featuring off leash dog park and playground. Centrally located seconds from Island Highway access to downtown or western communities and up island. Close to shops that include Quality Foods, Tim Hortons, Subway, Cascadia Liquor store, Bosley's, pharmacy, Starbucks, Cobs Bread and dollar store to name a few. Costco and    Big box stores and restaurants are within short driving distance. Closest restaurants and pubs that welcome family dining are 4mile brewery and Crooked Goose. Walking distance to Victoria General Hospital.

name: Saanich _ Berries  Country Getaway hosted by gina
description: Here you can enjoy a bit of the country. There are Wineries, Butchart Gardens , Butterfly World,. Victoria is 22 mins by various. After a day of touring, our getaway is a wonderful place to simply come and relax. The front and back decks are both great areas to sit where you can simply sit out in the sun and enjoy a book or a glass of your favourite beverage. If it is a swim you crave the Commonwealth Pool is 10 mins drive as is Elk Lake, Prospect Lake and Durance Lake. Pat Bay. Mt Work biking.
neighborhood_overview: Our space is close to many wineries., and one of our favourites the Sea Cider Farm and Ciderhouse. Some within walking distance and others a mere 10 min drive... There are many eats and pubs within 10 mins drive. Royal Oak, Broadmead Village and Brentwood Village. Bring your kayaks, paddle board or canoe, there is the Bay (the ocean)where on a beautiful day you will be greeted by seals, dolphins and if you are especially lucky our transient Orcas. There is Elk Lake, the Commonwealth Pool, Durance Lake and Prospect Lake, all within a 10 mins drive; if it is swimming that you need at the end of the day.
host_about: Outgoing. Favourite place to travel Provence.

name: Quiet Luxury 'Oasis at The Falls' in Downtown
description: Gorgeous south-facing condo {'Oasis at the Falls'}, 7th floor,  in the Falls: a short walk from both the Inner Harbour & Beacon Hill Park in downtown Victoria.  It is only steps away to everything Victoria has to offer!  It is a spacious 1100 square foot light filled condominium. This is an urban lifestyle gem and you are sure to enjoy this quiet oasis in the middle of the vibrant city of Victoria, British Columbia! Luxury resort living with all of the comforts of home. WiFi 5G no device limit
neighborhood_overview:
The Falls condo building is nestled within a few minutes’ walk to:
- Shopping including boutique stores
- Victoria Conference Centre
- Arts and entertainment district of Victoria
- The world famous Empress Hotel
- Victoria’s Inner harbour (harbour flights, boat tours, whale watching and cruise ships close by)
- Beacon Hill Park and Petting Goat Zoo
- Fisherman's Wharf and Float Homes
- Sightseeing bus tours
- Museums (including the Royal Museum and IMAX theatre)
- Dozens of restaurants and pubs including fine dining
- Souvenir shops
- Kids activities/entertainment
- The British Columbia legislature buildings
- Bustling coffee shops
- Spas
- Tourist attractions (hiking, biking, kayaking and much more within a short walk or drive)
- Movie theaters
- Exciting nightlife
- Markets and more!
host_about:
I love to travel and over the years have come to realize what comforts I and other guests would enjoy while staying away from home. It is great to stay someplace that feels comfortable, is clean, bright, airy, has all the modern amenities, and that you can just relax in the evenings enjoying a book, watching TV, surfing the internet or watching Netflix on our Smart TV’s (3-55 inch Samsung HD 4K Curved Smart TV's!) and as well simply enjoying the company of the other guests you are with.

I have tried to emulate this in our Oasis at the Falls. If you decide to book our condo we hope you enjoy the Victoria scrapbook of: local restaurants, pubs, attractions, tours to take, shopping close by, hiking areas, parks and many more items. Feel free to add yours in the guest book so that other guests are able to see what other items to do in and around Victoria!

name: Captain Jack's Subsea Retreat - Cottage/Studio
description: A beautiful Panabode  kitchenette/deck, private bathroom with shower and non-exclusive use of our private pool (heated to 84 degrees 15 May to 10 Oct), hot tub (year round)laundry and gardens. Enjoy 2.5 acres of gardens, poolside lounge areas.. Find some adventure with our full service Discover Scuba program all the way up to instructor certifications. We also offer private (group flat rate) snorkeling and wildlife tours aboard our custom-built Bombardier zodiac. See our website.
neighborhood_overview: Soak in the culture of our neighborhood here in Deep Cove. Drop in to the ‘honour store’ at Smyth’s Farm for fresh grown produce and homemade jams – just up the road from PJ's. Then visit the Deep Cove Market for delicious fare from local growers and makers, perfect for grabbing snacks on the go or preparing a meal at the house. Make sure to stop along the roadside and pick some fresh blackberries! Hike John Dean Provincial Park to Pickles’ Bluff. Explore a pristine old growth forest and panoramic views just minutes from town. Wander the shops and waterfront of Beacon Avenue, and grab the best coffee in town at Quince Café… Experience The Roost farm café and bakery for lunch. All ingredients used are from the farm/orchards and vineyard. Sit out on the patio and enjoy the sunshine or heaters on a cool day. Taste some locally made, award-winning ciders at Sea Cider Orchard. On Thursday nights Beacon Avenue comes alive with the Sidney Street Market from 5:30 – 8:30 pm. Browse local vendor
host_about:
Professional Dive Instructor/Boat Operator/Equipment Technician since mid 1970 +
Expects to train at least 10,000 divers before retiring (9020 + and counting).
Charters and Expeditions worldwide.

host_about: Hi, my name is Etienne.  I invite you to stay at Loving Earth Living Sky Retreat on Salt Spring Island where, along with my loving family, I offer you the best quality care during your stay.  We have together over 37 years experience offering care to individuals with special needs of all kinds; injuries, disabilities both physical and cognitive, seniors, those with illness, and those on a spiritual &/or  physical healing journey.  Our retreat is a sanctuary of solace, peace and healing.  I am a compassionate and gifted healer who is patient and empathic.  I love hiking in nature, gardening, being active outdoors, spending time with my family and being of service to others.  Contact me and we can speak further!

name: Cottage on the Bluff
description: The cottage is perfectly situated on the bluff of Otterbay, Pender Island.  With an unobstructed view of the Pacific, it immediately sets the tone for the days ahead.  An open vaulted living room with an adjoining kitchen creates an ultimate space to spend time.   The outside gives you an opportunity for outdoor living  with a  wrap around deck, sun umbrella and patio furniture.
neighborhood_overview:
Pender Island is one of the Southern Gulf Islands most beautiful.

Pender offers lovely waterfront parks, rolling countryside perfect for cycling, a lively arts scene, and a full slate of water activities.

Factor in good dining & several spas, and and it's no wonder this island gem is popular with stressed out urbanites.

(as written in Pender Island tourism)
host_about: Although I love the West Coast of BC and spend most of my time between our homes in Vancouver, Whistler and Pender Island....I am a lover of travel.    My heart resides in Italy, my feet amongst the sand in Mexico and my mind wherever travel opportunities bring me.   I am passionate about fitness, the outdoors, good food and the gather of friends and family.    Anytime I can share my experiences &  passions of life, I do so willingly.  Hence, why I want to share our cottage on Pender with you.

You also find yourself in walking distance of the most thrilling amenities Fernwood offers, such as: the Belfry Theatre, The Fernwood Inn, The Cornerstone Cafe, and the She Said Gallery.

This dynamic urban village also boasts: the Ça Va Bistro Moderne as well as the Stage Wine Bar, which has been identified by ENROUTE Magazine as one of the top 10 new restaurants in Canada.

Other services available in your area include: Studio 1313 Hair Salon, The Yoga Den, Soma Active Health, Gothic A.E. Piercing Salon with Nail Haven, Tonic Spa-tique, Fly the Cage Tattoo Studio, Who-Dyd-Your-Hair, The Paint Box School of Art, Aubergine Specialty Foods, Freedom Kilt and the Templed Mind Studio Gallery.

name: Welcome to Costa Del Sol Located in Victoria
description:
My unit is located in Gordon head, the beautiful seaside neighbourhood of the Greater Victoria.

Some things it has to offer are beautiful parks right on the ocean, as well as plenty of areas to grab food including local pubs within walking distance from the property.

Kick back and relax in the private hot tub that offers romantic lighting in this covered 600 square foot area, located right outside of the unit. This unit offers up to date local art and will feel like it's home away from home.
host_about: I've been living in Victoria since 1998 and worked as an electrician for a couple years, which then got me a job in the cable industry. I love spending my days off in the bush where I can go camping and explore what the island has to offer. I take great pride in my vacation rental and am excited for people to enjoy it.

name: Station House
description:
Your hosts live on the property and we are therefore not subject to the new regulations.

Guests are sure to enjoy a memorable vacation in this fully furnished two bedroom/one bath net-zero carriage house on an acreage. Situated on the Galloping Goose at 44km mar guests can cycle in/out, are minutes from Town Centre and Sooke Potholes. Relax in the evening on the balcony overlooking the garden listening to the birds. Pets are welcome provided they get along with the resident cat and dog.

description:

neighborhood_overview:
Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas. This unit is the bottom unit. The top unit may be occupied by the owners during your stay.

Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Sleek Condominium steps from the Inner Harbour
description:
Bright, spacious and modern downtown Victoria. Steps to some of the best restaurants, museums, shopping, Chinatown and inner harbour - you won’t need a car!
If you have one, there is secure parking and bike storage with easy access to beautiful trails.
Prepare meals in the fully equipped kitchen and relax after a full day of sightseeing in two well separated bedrooms.
*PLEASE NOTE - A CONSTRUCTION OF A RESIDENTIAL BUILDING ACROSS THE STREET. NOISE POTENTIAL DURING WEEKDAY HOURS*
Lic #35678
neighborhood_overview:
The condo lies just minutes’ walk from great restaurants like Brasserie l’Ecole, Il Terrazzo, The Keg Steakhouse + Bar, and Zambri’s. There are plenty of great tap houses nearby. Victoria’s number one breakfast spot, Jam Cafe, is across the street and historic Chinatown a block away.
Please note: our city is growing and a construction of a residential builing has been approved across the street. February 2022 clearing of the site has started. We will post updates here about the progress.

name: Peach Tree Room, Bayview Cottage, Vesuvius Beach
description:
The Fig Tree Garden Room is one room in this B&B.
A Queen sized, small but cozy room with a view out to the garden and just 70 metres to the beach. Small bathroom is next to the room for your private use.
Use of a shared living room area and kitchenette with a refrigerator/microwave and an area to prepare snacks.
neighborhood_overview: A super Fish Resteraunt, a sweet convenience store and coffee shop. Plus the best swimming beach on the island with magical sunsets. Trails and hikes are steps away too! We are also on the bus route into Ganges town. Apps 10 mins ride!
host_about: Hello my name is Lisa, I have lived on Salt Spring Island for over 20 years although originally from London, England. I raised my children on this beautiful island and have loved my life here. I am a creative person and also have a practice as a Holistic Beauty Therapist and offer Therapy and coaching in the Healing Arts,  here and online globally. I do Bowen Therapy, Reiki and EFT and also am known for my lovely relaxing facials too! I love my home,  I love to cook and enjoy good company.  Connecting with lovely people, travelling for beautiful experiences and enjoying my life as joyfully as possible are top of my agenda! My motto is life is short and a gift not to be wasted!!!  I look forward to meeting you and giving you the opportunity to experience this beautiful island and all it has to offer.  Truly a nourishing and healing place to be....welcome! As a side note there are two friendly cats on the property and two very sweet dogs,  for people who have allergies, its worth mentioning!

name: Cozy Cabin Getaway
description: Experience a private and peaceful getaway for four! Offering luxury and comfort in a forest surrounding, HERE is where memories are made! Whether you are staying to relax and rejuvenate, to enjoy some good laughs with a friend, or to romance a loved one, the Serenity Cabin has a little something for everyone. We are pet friendly but require a $30 fee per pet.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the beautiful municipality of Metchosin, the Serenity Cabin is central to various hiking trails, sandy beaches, an abundance of nature appreciation, and borders Matheson Lake Park.

Drive or walk down to the lake to enjoy the spectacular scenery. As well as hiking, biking, trout and bass fishing, canoeing/kayaking, and swimming. If you are looking to dine out MyChosen Café and MyChosen Pizza are only minutes away.

Just around the corner is Pedder Bay Marina, known for its world class fishing grounds. Enjoy a Starbucks coffee, alcoholic beverage and a bite to eat while watching the boats go by. Also offering power boat rentals, kayaking, and fishing charters if you're looking to spend time out on the ocean.

description: Stunning waterfront, beautiful independent small cottage, private parking/entrance, cozy and comfortable with all amenities (cable, Wi-Fi, etc), barbecue, and breathtaking sunset views. Fenced trails within the property and plenty of room to relax and enjoy nature, including the eagle's nest right above the cottage. E-bikes, kayaks and paddleboards available for rent in town. Sorry, no kids under 14.
neighborhood_overview:
You are five minutes from a wonderful hiking trail system with amazing views.
There's plenty of activities and things to do on Salt Spring, so we guarantee you'll want to come back. You may check the Island's event calendar at the "Salt Spring Tourism Event Calendar" (on web search).
host_about: We love traveling and exploring new places.

name: #33 Gladstone
description:
Welcome to the beautiful Victoria, BC!

Greeting you upon your arrival will be a fully equipped upper suite with three cozy bedrooms, a large living room for relaxing, a bright kitchen for cooking and a delightful back yard and patio, set-up with a BBQ for your tasty meals, but that is not all folks!

You also find yourself in walking distance of the most thrilling amenities Fernwood offers, such as: the Belfry Theatre, The Fernwood Inn, The Cornerstone Cafe, and the She Said Gallery.
neighborhood_overview:
This two bedroom suite in the heart of Victoria has, a full kitchen, living room, laundry facilities. A large backyard with BBQ and patio set is ideal for warm summer nights. Off street parking and a private entrance are included for your convenience.

You also find yourself in walking distance of the most thrilling amenities Fernwood offers, such as: the Belfry Theatre, The Fernwood Inn, The Cornerstone Cafe, and the She Said Gallery.

This dynamic urban village also boasts: the Ça Va Bistro Moderne as well as the Stage Wine Bar, which has been identified by ENROUTE Magazine as one of the top 10 new restaurants in Canada.

Other services available in your area include: Studio 1313 Hair Salon, The Yoga Den, Soma Active Health, Gothic A.E. Piercing Salon with Nail Haven, Tonic Spa-tique, Fly the Cage Tattoo Studio, Who-Dyd-Your-Hair, The Paint Box School of Art, Aubergine Specialty Foods, Freedom Kilt and the Templed Mind Studio Gallery.

name: Stroll to the beach from our Cordova Bay Suite!
description: A beautiful, modern, bright main floor suite in the heart of Cordova Bay. Walking distance to everything that you might need.  Enjoy the views of our peaceful garden farm after a busy day of sightseeing from your private deck!   We are  a 3 minute walk to one of the most popular beaches in Victoria and everything else is minutes away.  Hike up a mountain, cycle the Lochside Trail..... Only 15 minutes to Downtown Victoria, 20 minutes from the ferries and 10 minutes to Butchart Gardens.
neighborhood_overview: This neighbourhood has become one of the most sought after places to be in Victoria. Our house is so close to the beautiful ocean and minutes from the old growth forest of Mt. Doug and Beaver Lake. You can walk on the beautiful beach, and visit local farms and wineries!
host_about:
Darren and I have travelled and lived all over the world before settling down and living in Cordova Bay, Victoria.  We love it here!  
We are both self employed and have two kids who spend most of the time at the pool.   
I work at a non-profit that teaches kids how to grow food organically.  I am living my dream:)  I have backyard chickens and am passionate about growing good, healthy food. 
Darren works in advertising and marketing.  You have certainly bought something he sold to you:)
We love meeting people from all over the world and look forward to meeting you too!

name: Bayview Room, Bayview Cottage Vesuvius Beach
description:
The Bayview Room at Bayview Cottage B&B.
This bright and fresh Queen bedroom with private entrance sleeps two people with an en-suite small private bathroom & private deck facing the garden with small seaview. 50 Metres walk to the warmest swimming beach on the island! Five minute walk to the ferry. You have Nespresso coffee and a tea selection in your room plus a smart TV for Netflix. You also have your own living room with a kitchenette shared with one other room if occupied.
neighborhood_overview: Vesuvius is a small and friendly community, with a convenient store and a lovely Fish Resteraunt within walking distance.  The beach here is famous for its beautiful sunsets and is the warmest swimming beach on the island.  The bus runs from the end of our road into town and gives you access to the rest of the island too.  Vesuvius Ferry gives access to Vancouver Island and is steps away from our neighbourhood.
host_about: Hello my name is Lisa, I have lived on Salt Spring Island for over 20 years although originally from London, England. I raised my children on this beautiful island and have loved my life here. I am a creative person and also have a practice as a Holistic Beauty Therapist and offer Therapy and coaching in the Healing Arts,  here and online globally. I do Bowen Therapy, Reiki and EFT and also am known for my lovely relaxing facials too! I love my home,  I love to cook and enjoy good company.  Connecting with lovely people, travelling for beautiful experiences and enjoying my life as joyfully as possible are top of my agenda! My motto is life is short and a gift not to be wasted!!!  I look forward to meeting you and giving you the opportunity to experience this beautiful island and all it has to offer.  Truly a nourishing and healing place to be....welcome! As a side note there are two friendly cats on the property and two very sweet dogs,  for people who have allergies, its worth mentioning!

name: The Great Escape - Shirley
description: ‘The Great Escape - Shirley’ is secluded and surrounded by forest.  You will have your own Hot Tub.  The Coach is a 40' luxury Coach that has an electric fireplace, large slide-out, Corian counters, forced air heating & 1 Gbps WiFi.  There is a propane fire pit, BBQ outside, wood fired pit, with lots of wood.  It has a Queen ‘Sleep Number’ bed, a sofa bed and sleeps up to 4.  Has a bathroom, washer & dryer, is fully furnished & equipped.  Bring clothes, food and enjoy The Great Escape - Shirley
neighborhood_overview: TGE-S is a short 14 minute drive to downtown Sooke, with many Parks, Beaches and walking paths close by.  Shirley Delicious is but a 7 minutes away.  Stoked Wood Fired Pizza is an 8 minute drive and French Beach is 9 minutes away.  If you want to surf, Jordon River is only 17  minutes away.  Everything from grocery stores, restaurants, medical centres and clinics, drug stores, and a multitude of other shops and stores, are all within close proximity in Sooke.
host_about: We enjoy the simple things in life....chocolate, red wine, our kids and grandkids, putzing in my garden or shop and jammie days watching NASCAR races and football together.

name: Lugrin Place Suite
description: Come and enjoy a west coast suite in a quiet neighborhood.  Close to downtown and the wilds of Vancouver Island.  Experience why we call this place home, rain and shine.
neighborhood_overview: Our quiet neighborhood has lots of street parking, is full of old Garry oak trees, is only 10 minutes from downtown by car and about 15 minutes from downtown by bicycle via the E&N Rail Trail that goes by close to our house.  (The E&N Trail connects with Victoria's main bike route, The Galloping Goose Trail) There's plenty of birds and a few deer and raccoons in the neighborhood too.  You can also check our High Rock Park up at the top of the hill behind our home.
host_about: My husband and I are busy professionals.  We enjoy being outside in our garden and the beautiful temperate rain forest which is our home on Vancouver Island.  We like to go to festivals and enjoy a good food truck every now and then.  We enjoy the outdoors no matter the season.   We hope that our guests will find the guest suite to be cozy and very west coast.  If you are looking to relax, here on business or want a good adventure, you will find our home centrally located to whatever type of stay you are looking for.

name: Saanichton Home with a view
description: Spacious, bright and inviting. Make yourself at home in this fully equipped suite. We are        located on a  semi rural half acre.  There is off-street parking for our guests.
neighborhood_overview: Wallace House is situated on over half an acre.  Although we are in the country, we are an easy walk to a major grocery store, banks, restaurants, coffee shops and other amenities.  Our area is in the midst of walking and cycling routes and trails.  We have views across the farm lands to the ocean, Gulf Islands and Mount Baker in Washington State.
host_about: My wife, Gloria and I are retired and have lived here since 2006. We started running our vacation rental suite in 2007 and enjoy meeting people from all over the world. I like to ride my bicycle around on the trails and roads of southern Vancouver Island.  Hiking is another thing I like to do on the many beautiful trails in the area. Gloria and I love to explore and go camping.

name: Bright 1 bedroom - convenient location
description:
This is a great home-away-from-home. The suite is ideal for singles or couples who are moving to Victoria but have yet to find their new home/community or those that have a work assignment in Victoria.

Please note that we have a 29 night minimum stay requirement. All bookings receive a ten percent discount off the listed daily rate.

City of Victoria Business License 1041345
neighborhood_overview: We are located in Victoria's Hillside-Quadra neighborhood which is home to about 6,700 residents and about 75 businesses.  Its location within the city provides easy access to all services and amenities of downtown Victoria as well as easy access to Vancouver Island's two major highways. The neighborhood also includes expansive open areas — Topaz and Summit Parks — which are enjoyed by local residents as well as sports groups coming from many other parts of Greater Victoria.
host_about: Shelley and I moved to Victoria in 1992 and raised four children here. We are now in retirement and almost an empty nest!  We love it when we can still corral the kids for a family dinner and movie night.  We also enjoy spending time with our siblings and in-laws who are spread out across Canada and the United States.

name: Salt Spring Guest Suites- The Violet Suite
description: At Salt Spring Guest Suites we offer boutique style suites tucked close to the village of Ganges in the center of Salt Spring Island.  The "Violet" suite is the perfect location for your holiday getaway.  Perched above town, it's a quick 5 minute stroll into the heart of Ganges.  Vacation in style + comfort with modern furnishings in this bright and airy space. Enjoy a soak in our sweet slipper tub before drifting off for another day of exploring all of Salt Spring's treasures.
neighborhood_overview: Salt Spring Guest Suites in located on a quiet neighbourhood street just a quick 5 minute walk from the heart of Ganges.  We are on the edge of Mouat Park where there are walking trails, a small bike park & a disc golf course.  It's so quick to pop into town and grab fresh coffees, head out for brunch and check out the great island shopping, including the Salt Spring Saturday market in the park.

description:

name: The Owls Perch Treehouse ~Luxury Treetop Retreat~
description: A truly unique treehouse perched 30 feet high among the trees. This amazing structure is attached to 3 large cedars and 1 giant maple using advanced tree tabs that allow the trees to sway gently, providing a natural and immersive experience. The large deck offers stunning views across the Salish Sea to the Mountains of Washington state. With all the modern amenities you could need, it's the perfect place to relax and unwind.  Experience the magic and wonder of treehouse living for yourself!
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is located on the Galloping Goose Trail, once a train track used by an old gold mining town. The treehouse is also near the Sooke Potholes Provincial Park, which offers freshwater swimming, waterfalls, wildlife, and pipe walks.
host_about: Our family moved to Vancouver island with our daughter to be closer to nature. We chose Sooke because it’s where the rainforest meets the sea. We love hosting, traveling and exploring.

Approximately 1 hour from Victoria, B.C. and 30 minutes from Sooke, B.C.
host_about: We are an active family that enjoys the natural beauty of our West Coast lifestyle.  When soccer and hockey are finished for the weekend, you'll find us hiking in the forest or by the ocean.
