neighborhood_overview:
Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.


If you don’t feel like cooking The Renfrew Pub, Bridgeman’s West Coast Eatery, Coastal Kitchen Café and Tomi’s Home Cooking are all a short walk away.

The local General Store is about a 1km walk along Parkinson Rd and has a small selection of groceries, beer, wine and a cash machine. It’s a good idea to stock up on groceries on your way to Port Renfrew either in Sooke on your way from Victoria or in Lake Cowichan.

The list of activities in Port Renfrew are endless; seeing some of Canada’s t
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Brand New Home on the ocean
description:
Situated on One and a half acres of forested land, directly on the ocean sits your modern architectural two year old home.
Private long winding driveway with electric gate.
Perfectly landscaped gardens on this exquisite property. Amazing forested acreage with a full view of downtown Victoria, Olympic Mountains, Mount Baker… and of course directly on the ocean. Gorgeous sunrises!!
Outdoor activity is never ending.
Surrounded by golf courses, biking trails, hiking trails, lakes and the ocean.
neighborhood_overview:
We are minutes walk to the ocean and Albert Head lagoon and bird sanctuary.
The house is directly on the ocean 🌊 however it is 60ft above the beach so the access to the ocean is along a short wooded path. A lovely walk.
Downtown Victoria is a short 20 -30 minute drive, traffic permitting.
Shopping in the area is plentiful but will require a car. Within 10 minutes drive is Westshore Mall and an additional 5 minutes drive is another mall with Costco, Bestbuy, Petsmart, golf store, to name a few.
For golfers this is a haven. Within 25 min drive is the famous Bear Mountain golf course, but even closer corses include, Highland pacific, Metchosin, Olympic view. These are all public courses. Bookings required.
Hiking and bike riding is in abundance and within walking or a short car ride. For a complete listing, please go to victoriatrails.com.
There are many grocery stores and restaurants in the area as well as WholeFoods closer to downtown Victoria.
host_about: Since selling my business in 2006, I have been retired and travelled extensively.  I have lived 12 years in Melbourne Australia , 14 years in London England, 4 years in Thailand, Toronto and now settled in Victoria.  I love being on the ocean and enjoy being surrounded by nature and blessed to have spectacular views.

name: The Trincomali Hideaway Oceanfront Yurt
description: This luxurious oceanfront yurt is hidden in an ancient cedar grove providing privacy and an amazing backdrop to its unprecedented ocean front setting. Set atop an ocean front rock face with a fully covered patio. A fully equipped kitchen and spa like bathroom highlight the luxurious amenities included in this stay. An upscale romantic getaway like no other. Breakfast provided, our guests receive coffee, teas, a bottle of our house cider and our fresh pastries during their stay.
neighborhood_overview: The yurt is located on the famous Walkers Hook Road, a very popular walking, biking and scootering destination due to it being flat, relatively straight and full of spectacular ocean views. It is close to the Fernwood cafe, the Twig and Buoy restaurant and the iconic Fernwood pier. It's a close drive to Ganges town centre and all the ferry terminals.
host_about:
We are a little family with big hearts who live on a tiny island and run a small farm. 

Jason and Rochelle have been married for 3 years and have one toddler, Munro and one baby, Mae. We spend our days working on our farm, hosting our guests and enjoying our island life with our 12 hens and 4 dogs. We have two big Irish wolf hounds; Hamish and Beowulf, and two small senior rescues, Ferdinand and Ludwig.

We love food, wine, coffee, playing on the beach, swimming in the sea and snacking in our garden. 

We can’t wait to show you all the spoils of our magical 30 acre property with our private 3 acre ocean front beach. 

Welcome to The Hen and Hound Farm and Accommodations on Salt Spring Island.

name: Creekside tiny paradise. Surf hike and chill.
description: Sweet cozy tiny paradise located in Jordan River next to some beautiful surf beaches, hiking trails and forests.Stunning land with giant trees, mushrooms, creeks and lots of awesome things to do right at your steps. The place is perfect for one or two people with an accent on outdoor enjoyments such as a fire pit, BBQ and picnic table. The inside is heated with a wall mounted fireplace , has a shower and the basic to cook a warm meal after a long day of hiking and surfing. A very chill out nook.
neighborhood_overview: Very special area, near the surf, the hikes, nestled in a red cedar forest. You can hear our creek from the house in the rainy season! The area is super chill and suited for outdoor activities and resting in the wilderness. There are other houses around but in Jordan river most places are huge and very private as they all sit on 2.4 acres of third growth forest. You may ear from time to time the neighbour's  dog barking especially if there are bears around, but for the most part its a very quiet area.The closest Grocery store is in SOOKE 35 minutes away so come  with the food you need. There is a super cool little cafe 5 minutes away, a pizzeria and some other small quaint food offers.
host_about: Surfer and adventure seeker who loves to create special places & experiences for others to enjoy.

name: Smoky Mountain Retreat-Peaceful & Private Suite
description: Smoky Mountain Retreat is a rural escape hidden away in a quiet corner of Metchosin. Pour your morning coffee, make your way onto the expansive patio and be greeted by the panoramic views of sprawling green forests, the Pacific Ocean and the snow capped Olympic Mountains as you relax & rejuvenate in the new outdoor hydrotherapeutic hot tub.

name: Bonsai Bunkhouse (Off Grid Eco-Friendly Tiny Home)
description: The Bonsai Bunkhouse, located in beautiful Jordan River, B.C, is an off-grid, 150 sq ft eco-friendly, tiny home. Located in a quiet corner of our property, situated in a Japanese garden inspired setting, which we built using mainly reclaimed and recycled materials. The cabin has a king bed in the upper loft and the banquette  below turns into a queen bed. Our property is located within a minute drive from the Juan De Fuca Trailhead (China Beach) as well as the beaches of Jordan River.
host_about: We enjoy everything the beautiful west coast has to offer; hiking, fishing, having beach fires, and especially surfing. name: Large Suite Fairfield Heritage Manor, Free Parking
description:
Business Licence #00039505

Large basement suite at Larkspur Manor Suites located in the heart of Fairfield, a sought-after historic neighbourhood in Victoria. This fantastic location is within walking distance to all levels of amenities, restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores, tourist attractions, Cook Street Village, Beacon Hill Park, Downtown, Dallas Road waterfront, and transit. Whether it's for short or long stays, this fully furnished suite offers the comfort of a home away from home.
neighborhood_overview: Location, location, location! Our well-maintained beautiful heritage manor is located in the heart of Fairfield, a charming walkable neighbourhood with many century-old heritage homes on quiet tree-lined streets lead to the Salish Sea, to the famous waterfront Dallas Road, Clover Point Park, and many beaches including picturesque Gonzales Bay, and dramatic views of the Olympic Mountains. Fairfield is home to Cook Street Village, which is steps from our property, is a lively strip featuring laid-back eateries, cafés, sidewalk patio, grocery stores, and small local shops.  Our neighbourhood boasts the vibrant and popular Moss Street Market, only a few blocks from us, a weekly summer outdoor market, with stalls of local produce and crafts. For anyone who appreciates Victorian, Edwardian, and Craftsman homes, or who wants a change of pace from the hustle and bustle of Downtown, look no further than this unique neighbourhood.  The proximity to Downtown, the water, many attractions, amenitie
host_about: I am outgoing, friendly, and respectful.  I love travelling, photography, trying out new food, and meeting new people.  When I am not busy taking care of my business, I enjoy going for walks and hikes with my family and our dog, Cosmo.

name: Ocean View With Hot Tub Family Home in Otter Point
description: South facing with views of the ocean and Olympic Mountain as well as a two person Japanese style soaking hot tub. We are a family that is often away and have chosen make our house available to travellers while away. Two storey home with the primary bedroom upstairs and 2nd bedroom downstairs both with ocean views. Situated at the end of a rural street.  This is the main house on the property that has a secondary cabin also an airbnb separated by a courtyard and shares a driveway/parking area.
neighborhood_overview: We are located just behind Gordon’s beach. 15 minute drive to Sooke town centre and 20 minute drive to Jordan River.
host_about:
Pursuing a life by the sea and looking forward to sharing our slice of paradise with you. We love how Airbnb has changed the way people travel and some of our favourite stays have been in Paris, Palm Springs, London and Quebec City.

What we love most about this area are the beautiful hikes through old growth forests down to the wild west coast beaches. 

Happy Travels

name: Bright 2-bed private home w/ King bed, AC, patio
description: Welcome to your private oasis in this guest-favorite, sunlit carriage house. This detached haven offers a serene stay with a luxurious king-size bed, a convenient pull-out double bed, & a secluded, fenced patio for your use. Enjoy modern comforts, including an HDTV, SS appliances, high-end laundry, and a fully equipped kitchen. Whether you’re a family or a small group, this well-loved space provides a relaxing home away from home. Reserve your stay now for the ultimate in comfort & tranquility!
neighborhood_overview:
You are walking distance to two lakes, the Sooke hills wilderness trail, and mount wells regional park (short hike to amazing city and mountain views). Just down the street you can also walk to Starlight Stadium, home of the Pacific FC and Rugby Canada. The epic Jordie Lunn Bike park is just around the corner.

Get a great workout in or relax in the pools at the nearby YMCA. Or go for a climb at Boulder Climbing.

Families will love the wave pool, huge park, and the bowling alley that are all very close.

Langford is home to amazing local restaurants, delicious bakeries, and the regions only Costco.

We use quality cotton sheets, comfortable pillows, and love to make sure you have enough supplies for your stay.

Our guest suite is yours to enjoy! Mayne Island awaits you with its hiking trails, e-bike rentals, kayaking and more. Breakfast brought to your door!!

name: Mon Studio
description:
"Mon Studio" is your place to kick back and relax. Beautifully decorated basement suite, private entrance in the back facing the backyard. Fully equipped with lots of natural light. Enjoy the patio, gazebo and large backyard.
This studio is suited for one adult or a couple.

The beautiful Cordova Bay beach, restaurant, golf courses and quaint Matticks Farm are just steps away.

There is 24/7 free parking on the street. The neighbourhood is very safe.
neighborhood_overview:
- Cordova Bay is one of Victoria's most desirable neighbourhoods.
- Cordova Bay beach is the most beautiful beach in Victoria.
- The house is less than 5 minutes walking distance to the beach and to the famous Beach House restaurant with its breathtaking view of the ocean and mountains.
- The quaint Matticks Farm is a stroll away with its unique boutiques and welcoming atmosphere.
- The house is a stroll away from the Cordova Bay golf course
- Close to Elk Lake and Mount Douglas hiking trails
- Approximately 15 minutes to Butchart Gardens
- Approximately 15-20 mins to Thetis lake beach

name: Smoky Mountain Retreat-The Forest Cabin
description: Smoky Mountain Retreat Cabin is a rural escape hidden away in the quiet corners of Metchosin. Enjoy your morning coffee on the patio surrounded by the peacefulness of nature with views of the Pacific Ocean and the snow capped Olympic Mountains in the distance. Spend your days adventuring to nearby lakes & ocean beaches and hiking & biking local trails . Upon your return home relax the night away in the hydrotherapeutic hot tub under the stars.
neighborhood_overview: Metchosin is a quaint little town that is very much rural country living. Within minutes of your stay there are great hiking trails, ocean and lake beaches, the Galloping Goose trail, and boat/kayak rentals. This sweet little town has a few food establishments, many side-of-the-road farmers stands that sell veggies, eggs, flowers and baked goods. We pride ourselves on being honest, hard-working, community-minded people always willing to help a neighbour.

name: The Perfectly Peaceful Wildflower house
description: Enjoy the blissful tranquility of the Wildflower House, year round!  Come and refresh while relaxing in our masterfully updated cottage style home. You will be immediately removed from your busy life the moment you step foot on our property.  The home boasts 3 bedrooms and 2 updated bathrooms. There will be plenty of space outdoor to relax, either in the new 8 person cedar sauna, the firepit or at the large 8- 10 person outdoor dining table where you’ll get ocean glimpses and magical sunsets. 😊
neighborhood_overview:
The Wildflower house is conveniently located close to the Vesuvius area in an extremely quite neighbourhood with quaint roads for strolling/running.
It is the perfect spot to kick back and relax while listening to the birds.
host_about:
Hey there,

We are Aaron, Angie, Aeson & Akai..also known as the A-Team!  We’re a fun loving homeschool family of four.
After spending the past decade in the Okanagan, we have set down roots here on beautiful Salt Spring Island.  Being born and raised on Vancouver Island, we are all very happy to be back by the ocean.  Our family loves to spend our time outdoors... Gardening, hiking, fishing, camping, hanging at the beach and exploring all the amazing places the west coast has to offer.  It has been our dream for years to host a unique space of our own and we hope you love what we’ve created as much as we do!

name: The Bee View Suite
description: The Bee View Suite is located in Shirley on Vancouver Island and features an incredible view of the Juan de Fuca Straight and Olympic Mountains that you can enjoy from the private deck and hot tub. You may also see some friendly honey bees buzzing past from the bee hives that are kept on the property. Interested in these fascinating pollinators? David and Emiko would be happy to give you a tour. Just two kilometres from French Beach and five kilometres from Sandcut Beach.
neighborhood_overview: Shirley, British Columbia is located between Sooke and Jordan River on the West Coast of Vancouver Island. The area is known for the historic Sheringham Lighthouse, Shirley Delicious Cafe, Stoked Pizzeria, French Beach and Sandcut Beach.

name: Daisy the Travelux Trailer
description: Come unwind in our beautifully renovated  travelux trailer. You’ll be sure to love the reclaimed wood finishings and vintage charm. Tucked amongst the wildflowers and fir trees on the corner of our property, you will have sun and privacy. She has a fully functional kitchen, bathroom with shower and a large comfy bed covered in soft cozy linens. We are a quick 5 min drive to Ganges and in close proximity to beaches, lakes, golf course, movie theatre, ferry, biking trails, tennis courts and more.
neighborhood_overview:
Daisy is conveniently located close to the Vesuvius area in an extremely quite neighbourhood with quaint roads for strolling/running.
It is the perfect spot to kick back and relax while listening to the birds.
host_about:
Hey there,

We are Aaron, Angie, Aeson & Akai..also known as the A-Team!  We’re a fun loving homeschool family of four.
After spending the past decade in the Okanagan, we have set down roots here on beautiful Salt Spring Island.  Being born and raised on Vancouver Island, we are all very happy to be back by the ocean.  Our family loves to spend our time outdoors... Gardening, hiking, fishing, camping, hanging at the beach and exploring all the amazing places the west coast has to offer.  It has been our dream for years to host a unique space of our own and we hope you love what we’ve created as much as we do!

neighborhood_overview:
Set amidst the natural beauty and unspoiled charm of the Saanich Peninsula, the vibrant community of Sidney-by-the-Sea is the gateway to the BC Gulf Islands and the US San Juan Islands. This bustling commercial hub of the Saanich Peninsula is blessed with majestic views of the ocean, the Olympic and Cascade Mountain ranges. Sidney is a tourist’s dream – a friendly port with modern marinas and a multitude of unique galleries, gift stores, antique shops, restaurants, bakeries and coffee bars.

Sidney-by-the-Sea appeals to those who enjoy both seafaring excursions and land-based adventures. There are many inlets and nearby islands, 3 km of public accessible waterfront – including many beaches and great beachcombing – and several interesting attractions in and around this pretty little resort town. Sidney enjoys a moderate Mediterranean type climate with year-round mild temperatures, low rainfall and very little snow.

name: Charming Suite in Heritage Manor, Free Parking
description:
Business Licence #00039505

Charming 1 Bedroom Suite at Larkspur Manor Suites
located in Fairfield, a sought-after historic neighbourhood. This fantastic convenient location is within walking distance to all levels of amenities, coffee shops, restaurants, grocery stores, tourist attractions, Cook Street Village, Beacon Hill Park, Downtown, Dallas Road waterfront, and public transit. Whether it's for short or long stays, this fully furnished suite offers the comfort of a home away from home.
neighborhood_overview: Location, location, a perfect location!  Our well-maintained beautiful heritage manor is located in the heart of Fairfield, a charming walkable neighbourhood with many century-old heritage homes on quiet tree-lined streets leading to the Salish Sea, to the famous waterfront Dallas Road, Clover Point Park, and many beaches including picturesque Gonzales Bay, and dramatic views of the Olympic Mountains. Our property is steps to Cook Street Village, a lively strip featuring laid-back eateries, cafés, sidewalk patio, grocery stores, and small local shops.  Only a few blocks from us are the vibrant and popular Moss Street Market, a weekly summer outdoor market, with stalls of local produce and crafts. For anyone who appreciates Victorian, Edwardian, and Craftsman homes, or who wants a change of pace from the hustle and bustle of Downtown, look no further than this unique neighbourhood.  The proximity to Downtown, the water front, parks including the Beacon Hill Park, many attractions, ameni
host_about: I am outgoing, friendly, and respectful.  I love travelling, photography, trying out new food, and meeting new people.  When I am not busy taking care of my business, I enjoy going for walks and hikes with my family and our dog, Cosmo.

I love to travel and over the years have come to realize what comforts I and other guests would enjoy while staying away from home. It is great to stay someplace that feels comfortable, is clean, bright, airy, has all the modern amenities, and that you can just relax in the evenings enjoying a book, watching TV, surfing the internet or watching Netflix on our Smart TV’s (3-55 inch Samsung HD 4K Curved Smart TV's!) and as well simply enjoying the company of the other guests you are with.

I have tried to emulate this in our Oasis at the Falls. If you decide to book our condo we hope you enjoy the Victoria scrapbook of: local restaurants, pubs, attractions, tours to take, shopping close by, hiking areas, parks and many more items. Feel free to add yours in the guest book so that other guests are able to see what other items to do in and around Victoria!

name: Sooke Cove Beachouse
description:
Your private OCEANFRONT beachouse and property awaits. Located in Otter Point, 5km from Sooke Central.

Immerse yourself in nature, the waves are loud, wildlife sightings are many. Gently sloping property with paths down to 3 private pebble beaches and a fire pit area

South facing oceanfront acreage bordered by the Strait of Juan de Fuca and majestic Olympic Mountains. Truly an amazing West Coast experience.

Great location, 4km West of Sooke central, shopping, restaurants.
neighborhood_overview: Sooke's popularity as a scenic tourist destination has existed for generations. Well-known destinations in Sooke, such as Whiffin Spit and Sooke Potholes attract visitors both locally and from around the world. The area's popularity has increased as a base for visiting the wilderness parks of Vancouver Island's southwest coast — the West Coast Trail and Juan de Fuca Marine Trail. Sooke, BC is also famous for its beaches just on the outskirts of its neighbouring communities such as Shirley and Jordan River (Surfing). These beaches include Ella, Sandcut, French beach, Fishboat bay, China beach, Mystic beach and many more.
host_about:
I really enjoy hosting on Airbnb and making sure my guests have an amazing and memorable stay.

I love Sooke and am happy to share my favourite local beaches, hikes, restaurants and breweries.

name: ★Wits End★ A slice of paradise with Hot Tub
description:
The perfect pet friendly place to decompress and reconnect; immerse yourself in nature in Port Renfrew and enjoy a soak or 2 in the Hot Tub!

➞ Pet Friendly
➞ private hot tub
➞ High Speed Internet
➞ Netflix,
➞ Amazon Prime
➞ selection of board and card games

★ Add us to your Wishbook! ★
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Rainforest Chalet @ French Beach
description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for families or couples looking to explore the west coast.

The Chalet is a short walk to the sandy end of French Beach and a luxury wood burning cedar barrel sauna on site.

The Chalet has a chef inspired kitchen with gourmet cookware and is perfect for hosting dinners and family gatherings.

Stay warm by the wood fireplace and enjoy the natural views the stunning 2.66 acre property offers.
neighborhood_overview:
The Juan de Fuca Region is a surfers paradise, a hikers dream, and a book worms fantasy. Idyllic, beautiful, charming and raw, the surroundings invoke drama and serenity all in one.

Jordan River is a 7 minute drive, Sooke is a 20 minute Drive, Port Renfrew is 45 minutes, Victoria 1 hour.
host_about:
I am a young professional with a passion for travelling, surfing, hiking, snowboarding, cycling and all the other great activities that life has to offer.   I like to travel as often as possible and when my career allows.  

I have spent 3 years living in South East Asia, mainly surfing the perfect waves of Indonesia and diving the waters of the Indian Ocean.  I have travelled throughout Europe on numerous occasions and love the way of life.    

When travelling I can do it all. Frequently I camp on the beaches in Mexico exploring remote surf locations and have travelled the world with a backboard and a surfboard.  I also love to stay in style in luxury condos with my wife and baby daughter.

name: Lovely apartment in heritage house bed & breakfast
description: On the ground floor, the Dogwood Suite in Ashcroft House Bed & Breakfast is full of character and charm. This spacious, bright one bedroom suite boasts gorgeous hardwood floors, 9' ceilings, crown mouldings, and large windows that face out over our side garden. The fully equipped kitchen has two walls of windows which creates a lovely, bright space and granite counters. The luxurious bedroom has an incredibly comfortable king bed. The bathroom has a freestanding tub/separate shower.
neighborhood_overview: Located in the quiet residential area of downtown Victoria know as James Bay, our house, called Ashcroft House, is in a haven of heritage homes, whimsical gardens and friendly neighbours. We are one short block to the ocean and the Dallas Road Waterfront Trail, and half a block to Beacon Hill Park, the crown jewel of the Victoria parks system. Downtown Victoria is approximately 1 km from us - an easy, walk - where you can visit the Inner Harbour, the Parliament Buildings, the Royal BC Museum, the Empress Hotel and downtown shops and restaurants.
host_about: We are Shannon and Jonas. Along with our daughter and onsite manager,  Cassidy, we run Ashcroft House Bed & Breakfast in Victoria, BC. We also have a rental house in Port Coquitlam, BC. Shannon and Jonas worked at the Four Seasons Hotel Vancouver, and we now bring the five diamond service mentality to all we do for Ashcroft House and its guests, as well as to our other properties.

name: Lovely Suite in Heritage Manor, Free Parking
description:
Business Licence #00039505

Lovely 1 bedroom suite at Larkspur Manor Suites located in the heart of Fairfield, a sought-after historic neighbourhood in Victoria. This fantastic location is within walking distance to all levels of amenities, restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores, tourist attractions, Cook Street Village, Beacon Hill Park, Downtown, Dallas Road waterfront, and transit. Whether it's for short or long stays, this fully furnished suite offers the comfort of a home away from home.
neighborhood_overview: Location, location, a perfect location!  Our well-maintained beautiful heritage manor is located in the heart of Fairfield, a charming walkable neighbourhood with many century-old heritage homes on quiet tree-lined streets leading to the Salish Sea, to the famous waterfront Dallas Road, Clover Point Park, and many beaches including picturesque Gonzales Bay, and dramatic views of the Olympic Mountains. Our property is steps to Cook Street Village, a lively strip featuring laid-back eateries, cafés, sidewalk patio, grocery stores, and small local shops.  Only a few blocks from us are the vibrant and popular Moss Street Market, a weekly summer outdoor market, with stalls of local produce and crafts. For anyone who appreciates Victorian, Edwardian, and Craftsman homes, or who wants a change of pace from the hustle and bustle of Downtown, look no further than this unique neighbourhood. name: Petie's Cottage - 2 bed cottage
description:
Spacious 1250 sq ft cottage with vaulted ceiling, lots of windows, large kitchen, full size fridge, stove, dish washer, washer/dryer, 2 large bedrooms, sunken living room with propane fireplace, 2 bathrooms one in main area of the cottage & one ensuite, attached deck, barbecue & private parking. host_about:
My husband Howie and I will be your hosts. My mother, Jan and step father, Maurie Turner completed building their home in 1978. This was intended to be and became their dream home. 

They have always wanted to create a bed and breakfast but never got around to it. My mother, unfortunately passed away in 2014. We are now full-filling her wish to open her home to guests from around the world to share and enjoy the beauty of Vancouver Island that we have had the privilege to call home for over 50 years.  

We are in a two phase process. We are opening the first suite in our house at the moment and will have an 1100 sq ft. guest home on the property available by spring. We are continuing my mother's love of flower gardens to create an inviting yard to sit and relax on a warm summer evening or pull a ripe apple or plum from my mother's fruit trees. 

I owned and rented a guest cottage in California back in the '80's and had so much fun and many wonderful memories with our clients. We look forward to meeting you and creating new ones!

neighborhood_overview:
Salt Spring Island is a captivating gem nestled in the beautiful region of British Columbia, Canada. Known for its picturesque landscapes, artistic community, and laid-back atmosphere, it has become a beloved destination for travelers seeking a peaceful escape.

Nature enthusiasts will be enchanted by the island's diverse terrain, from lush forests and serene beaches to rugged coastline and rolling hills. Hiking trails like Mount Maxwell Provincial Park and Ruckle Provincial Park offer breathtaking views of the surrounding Gulf Islands and Salish Sea.

One of the island's main draws is its vibrant arts and crafts scene. Galleries and studios showcasing local talent dot the island, offering visitors the chance to admire and purchase unique creations. The Salt Spring Island Saturday Market, bustling with artisans, farmers, and food vendors, is a must-visit for a taste of the island's creative spirit.

The island's community exudes a warm and welcoming vibe,

name: Perfect Brand New Condo In The Heart of Sidney
description:
Hotel Licence in Sidney # 00004005

Bright and beautiful brand new 1 bedroom condo in the heart of downtown Sidney, steps away from the ocean and just minutes away from the Airport. It offers the perfect getaway for solo travelers or couples looking to explore the beauty of the island.

Whether you're visiting Sidney for a weekend getaway or extended stay, our suite offers the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and coastal charm. We can't wait to welcome you to our little slice of paradise!
neighborhood_overview:
Set amidst the natural beauty and unspoiled charm of the Saanich Peninsula, the vibrant community of Sidney-by-the-Sea is the gateway to the BC Gulf Islands and the US San Juan Islands. This bustling commercial hub of the Saanich Peninsula is blessed with majestic views of the ocean, the Olympic and Cascade Mountain ranges. Sidney is a tourist’s dream – a friendly port with modern marinas and a multitude of unique galleries, gift stores, antique shops, restaurants, bakeries and coffee bars.

Sidney-by-the-Sea appeals to those who enjoy both seafaring excursions and land-based adventures. There are many inlets and nearby islands, 3 km of public accessible waterfront – including many beaches and great beachcombing – and several interesting attractions in and around this pretty little resort town. Sidney enjoys a moderate Mediterranean type climate with year-round mild temperatures, low rainfall and very little snow.
host_about: At Your Host , we provide home owners a hands off  approach on managing their rentals and provide travellers amazing, clean, furnished places to call home during their stay in  Beautiful British Columbia.

neighborhood_overview: The District of North Saanich is located on the Saanich Peninsula of British Columbia, approximately 25 km (16 mi) north of Victoria on southern Vancouver Island. It is one of the 13 Greater Victoria municipalities. The District is surrounded on three sides by 20 km (12 mi) of ocean shoreline, and consists of rural/residential areas, a large agricultural base and is home to the Victoria International Airport and the Swartz Bay Ferry Terminal. Our neighborhood is covered in large forests, it is a migratory bird sanctuary, the neighbors are friendly, and it is safe to live here.

Ten minute drive to the World famous Butchart Gardens and kayaking to Todd Inlet in Brentwood Bay.

name: SALTY Stay Cabin
description:
The Salty Stay Cabin has been thoughtfully designed to help you unwind and reconnect. A Scandinavian cabin nestled amongst a lush landscape filled with willow trees, an orchard and multiple nearby beaches.

At the cabin you will find two bedrooms, a large kitchen, outdoor cooking area (spring 2025), patio + so much more. We invite you to Stay Salty with us! Reconnect to yourself, your loved ones + nature.
neighborhood_overview:
We are located on one of the most coveted locations on salt spring. The south end and quiet menhinick drive. It’s a peaceful laid back road filled with locals. We have access to multiple beaches within a 5 min walk and some great hikes.

Farm-stands, and popular food venues are within a 10 minute drive. It’s a great place for a home base and relaxing getaway.
host_about:
I grew up on the ocean, I could float before I could walk. I am at home when I have salt air flowing through my hair and adventure ahead of me. It is these parts of myself that have helped me focus my creative spirit into my business, SALT : a sustainable lifestyle brand that represents a story of adventure, the ocean, and what it is to protect our planet. You can find Location both on Salt Spring Island and in Victoria. 

Salt Spring has been my home since I was 2. It is my home, it is where I feel most grounded and I can't wait to share a piece of it with new friends.

name: Parlor Suite in Heritage Manor, Fairfield, near DT
description:
Business Licence #00039505

Beautiful Parlour Suite at Larkspur Manor Suites located in the heart of Fairfield, a sought-after historic neighbourhood. This fantastic location is within walking distance to all levels of amenities, restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores, tourist attractions, Cook Street Village, Beacon Hill Park, Downtown, Dallas Road waterfront, and transit. Whether it's for short or long stays, this fully furnished suite offers the comfort of a home away from home.
neighborhood_overview:
LOCATION:

Our heritage manor is located in the heart of Fairfield, a charming historical neighbourhood with many century-old heritage homes on quiet tree-lined streets leading to the Salish Sea, the famous Dallas Road waterfront, Clover Point Park, and many beaches including picturesque Gonzales Bay, and dramatic views of the Olympic Mountains. Within minutes easy walk from us is Cook Street Village, a lively strip featuring laid-back eateries, cafés, sidewalk patios, grocery stores, and small local shops. The vibrant and popular Moss Street Market, a weekly summer outdoor market, is only a few blocks away. Many of the attractions are within walking distance from us, such as the Craigdarroch Castle, the Government House, Beacon Hill Park, and the Inner Harbour. For anyone who appreciates Victorian, Edwardian, and Craftsman homes, or who wants a change of pace from the hustle and bustle of Downtown, look no further than our unique neighbourhood. The proximity to Downtown, the

name: Stylish 1 Bedroom Guesthouse in Private Setting
description: Relax in this calm and stylish 575 sq ft self-contained carriage house, nestled on a quiet three acre property surrounded by nature. It is the ideal location for anyone looking for a quite place to relax while only a short distance away from the hustle and bustle of town. Nature enthusiasts will appreciate the rural setting and close proximity to hiking and mountain biking trails.
neighborhood_overview:
The property is a forested 3 acre parcel in the Highlands, which is just outside Langford, BC (one of Canada’s fastest growing communities).
Hiking or Mountain Biking? The property is a short and quiet 5 minute walk to Gowlland Todd Provincial Park. The park is well known for its breathtaking scenery, and true West Coast nature. The park borders onto several other area parks, providing endless hiking and mountain biking trails. Upon request, we have two adult mountain bikes and helmets for use.
Frisbee Golf? The property is only a 5 minute drive to a popular disc-golf location
Shopping/Amenities? Only 10 minute drive to shopping (grocery stores, Costco, etc) and all major amenities (banking, gas, Home Depot,etc.).
Sightseeing? 25 minute drive to downtown Victoria, 15 minutes to the world famous Butchart Gardens, and 15 minutes to the award-winning Bear Mountain Golf Course.
host_about: Hi! We are Tim and Emi. We are both born and raised in Victoria and are proud of it. We have lived and worked in all areas of south Vancouver Island, and love it so much that we never left. We are excited to share with you this amazing place that we call home.

name: Eagle's View Penthouse
description:
Welcome to Eagle's View Penthouse, a stunning newly renovated mountain top Oasis nestled atop Triangle Mountain. Unobstructed 180-degree views of Mt Baker, the Olympic Mountains, Victoria, and the Pacific Ocean. Watch the eagles soar as the Cruise Ships come and go from Ogden Point. 500 sq ft deck to enjoy the views. Only 15 mins to Victoria and 5 minutes to Colwood and Langford, where you will find everything needed.

NOTE: All photos unless labeled otherwise were taken from the property.
neighborhood_overview: Eagle's View is situated in a quiet cul-de-sac at the top of Triangle Mountain in Colwood BC.  We are a 15 min walk to a beautiful swimming hole Lookout Lake and the wooded walking trails in Havenwood Park. The completely unobstructed views from this property are nothing short of spectacular. Interesting fact: During the Second World War Triangle Mountain was turned into a command post and was part of the coastal defense system due to the view from the harbor to Port Angeles.
host_about: I have lived in this area for 44 years, 19 years on Salt Spring Island and 25 years on Vancouver Island.  If you have any questions I am happy to help. name: Loft by water centrally located
description: Most central location. Uniquely designed space, a modern conversion from the historic Leiser building built in 1896. This 650 sqft space has 2 SEPERATE loft areas, one full hight with a memory foam queen bed, the other is a cute reading nook (not full height) with a small futon for one. Sofabed in the living room also converts to a queen size bed. Peekaboo Water views through picturesque window.
neighborhood_overview: This neighbourhood kept so much the history of this town. Every building has it's own story traced hundred years back. This is where very old meets new. The best part is, it is still the very central of our beautiful city.
host_about:
My husband and I love to travel and we have been to many beautiful places. And thanks to Airbnb. We get to experience so much more by staying locally. Now we have two little ones in our family, and it is getting hard and costly for us to keep doing what we use to do. So we decided to host. Meeting different people from all over the world is the next best thing if we don't get to go there ourselves. 
Victoria in my opinion is the best city in Canada. And still top of my list after I have travelled to many more cities around the world. It's beauty is beyond words. You got to experience it yourself. We are fortunate enough to have two cute condos here to share with you. Make it home. Just relax and enjoy what this city has to offer!

name: Private 1-Acre Oasis w/ Pond, Near Ferry & Airport
description: Discover our charming and unique airbnb, nestled on a lush 1-acre property. With a serene 1/4-acre pond, graceful herons, majestic eagles, playful dragonflies & musical tree frogs, it's the perfect retreat. Friendly horses and miniature ponies make it an ideal destination for animal lovers. With scenic hiking trails, nearby ocean beaches, & a pet-friendly atmosphere, our airbnb has something for everyone. Book your stay now and experience the peace & tranquility of this one-of-a-kind place.
neighborhood_overview: Calm, peaceful, and tranquil are a common description of our neighbourhood. This equestrian neighbourhood has walking trails and is close to the ocean.  Pet the miniature horses or gaze at our peaceful pond to relax.  We are 10 minutes from Sidney or the YYJ airport, 25 minutes from Butchart Gardens or 35 minutes to downtown Victoria.  There is a small BBQ, outside table to eat at and a small bistro table to have your coffee or drink.

neighborhood_overview:
lovely quiet neighbourhood.
Close to many activities such as golfing, fishing, hiking, swimming, biking trails (famous galloping goose trail minutes away). Great Canadian Casino close by....There are many great restaurants, museum, live theatre minutes away. host_about:
My husband and I are a professional couple who enjoy travel and collecting art. .We love the area which is close to  hiking trials, a wonderful  swimming lake, the ocean and the Galloping Goose trail.  In addition to our "day jobs" we own and operate a number of vacation rental properties . This keeps us busy but in a good way. We love food, wine and good company. In our free time my husband plays tennis, I go to yoga classes and we enjoy kayaking together/ We have a 10 month old standard poodle named Winston which we are  presently training  or he is training us- hard to tell really.
I hope you will love this home as much as we do!

name: Bachelor Suite in Heritage Manor, Fairfield
description:
Business Licence #00039505

Bachelor suite at Larkspur Manor Suites located in the heart of Fairfield, a sought-after historic neighbourhood in Victoria. This fantastic location is within walking distance to all levels of amenities, restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores, tourist attractions, Cook Street Village, Beacon Hill Park, Downtown, Dallas Road waterfront, and transit. Whether it's for short or long stays, this fully furnished suite offers the comfort of a home away from home.
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the heart of Fairfield, a historic charming walkable neighbourhood with many century-old heritage homes on quiet tree-lined streets leading to the Salish Sea, to the famous waterfront Dallas Road, Clover Point Park, and many beaches including picturesque Gonzales Bay, and dramatic views of the Olympic Mountains. Our property is steps to Cook Street Village, a lively strip featuring laid-back eateries, cafés, sidewalk patio, grocery stores, and small local shops. Only a few blocks from us are the vibrant and popular Moss Street Market, a weekly summer outdoor market, with stalls of local produce and crafts. For anyone who appreciates Victorian, Edwardian, and Craftsman homes, or who wants a change of pace from the hustle and bustle of Downtown, look no further than this wonderful, quiet, friendly residential neighbourhood. The proximity to Downtown, the water front, parks including the Beacon Hill Park, many attractions, amenities, public transit, and bike routes make
host_about: I am outgoing, friendly, and respectful.  I love travelling, photography, trying out new food, and meeting new people.  When I am not busy taking care of my business, I enjoy going for walks and hikes with my family and our dog, Cosmo.

name: The Red Door 11 min walk to Royal Jubilee Hospital
description:
Entire suite with 1 bedroom and a pullout couch.

Feel at home at the Red Door with touches of luxury throughout. Fall in love with the delightfully walkable and quiet South Jubilee neighbourhood during your stay. Find your new favourite cafe and thrift shop across the street.

Walking times:
11 min to Royal Jubilee Hospital
5 min to a large grocery store
3 min to the closest coffee shop
25 min walk to Gonzales Beach
40 min walk to Downtown

We think you’ll love staying at the Red Door Suite!
neighborhood_overview:
South Jubilee is a small neighbourhood just south of the Royal Jubilee Hospital, nestled between Fernwood and Oak Bay.

With two grocery stores under a 5 minute stroll away, dog park even closer and the charming Oak Bay Avenue just around the corner, this neighbourhood is a walkers delight.

This neighbourhood has many amenities within a 10 minute walk away including grocery store, boutique grocery store, liquor store, gas station, coffee shop, thrift store, cannabis store, walking trail and park.

The Oak Bay Marina, Gonzales Beach and McNeil bay are an under 30 minute walk away.

You can walk to downtown in 40 minutes.

This is a quiet street with a mix of families, working professionals and retirees. And lots of dogs!
host_about: I'm a mechanical engineer and energy systems researcher, currently working on the integration of renewable energy using demand response algorithms. I am also an avid cyclist, try my best to surf whenever I get the chance, and most weekends you'll find me out in the woods camping with friends.

name: Private & peaceful furnished campsite on eco-farm
description:
Nested amongst large cedar trees and next to our Japanese Maple garden, this furnished campsite offers convenience for those wanting a comfortable, nature-filled retreat in the woods.

• Spacious tent with queen-sized bed
• Outdoor kitchen with potable water, BBQ, mini-fridge, and cookware
• Bathroom with composting toilet
• Propane campfire
• Ornamental garden for lounging
• Includes (optional) tour: meet our animals, learn about how we are regenerating the farm and addressing climate change

We're on a quiet, rural road near several lovely places to visit:

15 minutes to Ganges
10 minutes to beautiful Beddis Beach
10 minutes to Cusheon Lake (great swimming)

name: Seaside Hummingbird
description:
Seaside Hummingbird is a beautifully decorated, new 2-bedroom Suite, surrounded by peaceful forests, magnolias, rhododendrons, hummingbirds, owls, and more.

The Ocean & French Beach are only a few minutes away on foot through a Provincial Park Pathway.

Modern full Kitchen, delightful custom mosaic Shower & Bathroom, Spacious open area with 36" smart TV & wifi, Soft Comfortable Queen beds, & 2 outdoor areas featuring a covered slab patio and an open-air fireplace with Seating under the Stars.
neighborhood_overview: Surrounded by Forest with Ocean waves heard nearby, this area is home to a wonderful array of birds, including many resident hummingbirds and owls. Butterflies frequent the gardens and the 20+ magnolia and rhododendrons trees located on the property. Organic gardens and large palm trees also welcome our guests, as well as a covered slab patio and an open-air fireplace where you can view a sky full of stars.
host_about:
It’s been wonderful experience to open this Airbnb. I am Personal fitness trainer and also single mom with two wonderful boys. I love to travel and love to see the world. At this moment, life is so wonderfully busy. So I would love to invite the world to my home since I can’t travel as much as before. 
Thank you for all the wonderful guests who come and appreciate our home and also thank you for all the people who give me honest suggestions. I will do my best to host you!

name: Waves at Cordova Bay Beach
description: Welcome to one of the most peaceful neighborhoods in Victoria! This modern lower level 1 bedroom suite sits directly in front of the beach providing a relaxing experience for those who stay. Whether you want to take a quiet stroll on the shoreline or head into the historic downtown area of Victoria, we can assure you that your stay here will have you coming back for more!
neighborhood_overview: Located close to many of the gems that Victoria has to offer, we can assure you that you won’t run out of things to do! Directly beside your suite, there is access to a public beach where you can indulge in water activities such as kayaking or paddle boarding. Alternatively, you can hop on a bike towards the Lochside Trail and head into either Sidney or downtown Victoria. If you are looking to explore, we recommend visiting the beautiful Butchart Gardens or the Royal BC Museum.

name: Beautiful beachfront Villa on 80 acres of farmland
description:
Bring your family to enjoy our incredible 80 acre oceanfront farm and stay in our beachfront villa. The stunning beach house is modern and filled with amenities to make your stay fun, private and relaxing while you explore the surrounding farm full of animals and fresh food or take a stroll along beautiful Ella beach.

The beach is just steps from the house and you have full access to over 1400ft of private waterfront where you can watch the seals and otters play.
neighborhood_overview:
Our farm is located inside the cute oceanside town of Sooke, BC. Close to nature and the beaches of the southern coast of Vancouver Island. All basic services are just a few minutes away and greater Victoria can be reached in about 30 minutes drive.

The beach house is set back on the farm away from the main farming activity. On the farm we grow fresh vegetables, have tons of fruit and friendly animals you are more than welcome to visit. It is truly a magical place.
host_about: Hi everyone! We are a family of 4 who have a big dream to create a beautiful farm on the southern tip of Vancouver Island and make it a place for everyone to visit, love and enjoy.

name: Bear Mountain Home - Rainforest View - Kip's Home
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space situated in beautiful Bear Mountain, Victoria-2 minutes to Langford and the highway. 2 bedrooms, one bath, large kitchen with GRAND island, quartz countertops throughout, dining area, living room, patio, rainforest backyard features outdoor dining and lounge backs onto a serene green belt. This is the perfect serene place to relax or work from home and enjoy the backyard from you laptop.  More pictures t come.
neighborhood_overview:
Places to see that are nearby:
- Mary Lake, Thetis Lake (3 min away), Elk Lake (20 min), Prospect Lake
- Goldstream Park 5-6 min from the house. Also has a waterfall depending on the hiking trail you take.

- Bear Mountain (3 min) , Mount Douglas Park 20 min (majestic views of the city scape), UVIC 30 min., Jericho beach at the bottom of UVIC down the hill has a zip line park.

- Butchart Gardens, Butterfly World (30 min away, is on the same street), Gobind Farms famous for the seasonal berries, ice cream, pies, tarts, seasonal vegetables, jams/syrups family owned and operated since 1980.

- Downtown Victoria - 20 min away
- Downtown: Parliament Buildings, Warf, Empress Hotel, Beacon Hill Park, Crystal Gardens, Miniature World, Whale Watching Tours, Fishing Tours, lots of restaurants, shopping Bay Center Mall. Lots of shopping along the wharf area between Warf and Douglas Street on many side streets.

Malls: Downtown Mall, Uptown M
host_about: Retired. Love clean non smelly places. I have OCD. Clean is extremely important. I am also a Superhost.  Bedding and pillows should not smell.

name: East Sooke private retreat, sleeps 4
description:
Get away from it all and enjoy this unique space nestled in the woods close to the trails of popular East Sooke Park. Explore the west coast of Vancouver Island with scenic drives to Sooke, Jordan River and Port Renfrew. Day trips take you to magnificent beaches and hiking trails with stunning vistas and the opportunity to view wildlife such as whales, bears, eagles and others.
A 40 min drive takes you to Victoria for shopping, dining and many tourist attractions including Butchart Gardens.
neighborhood_overview:
East Sooke is a quiet rural neighbourhood community surrounded by trees and hiking trails with the opportunity to see wildlife. A 5 to 10 min drive in either direction takes you to East Sooke Park access at either Pike Rd, Coppermine Rd, Anderson Cove or Aylard Farm.
A well stocked little grocer is just a 5 min drive away and open 7 days a week until 8 pm. For dining out locally there are 2 food trucks serving up yummy burgers and Asian fusion food as well as the world famous 17 Mile Pub. (5 and 10 min drive respectively) Larger grocery stores and restaurants are located in Sooke (20 min drive). For mall shopping and big box stores as well as larger restaurants head into Langford (25 min drive) or the capital city of Victoria (40 min drive)
host_about: Hello! and thank you for checking us out. My husband Curtis and I look forward to hosting and assisting in any way we can to help you get the most out of your stay. We’ve lived in East Sooke for 23 years and feel so fortunate to call this paradise home.

name: Studio @ James Bay
description: Beautiful renovated studio on lower level, located at James Bay. Walking distance to downtown attractions, museums, shopping, dining, etc. The studio is perfect for business travel or vacationing who want to escape and discover beautiful Victoria.  Steps from the Inner Harbor, Empress Hotel, Ogden Point, Beacon Hill Park
neighborhood_overview: James Bay is Victoria's oldest neighborhood known for its lively waterfront and charming Victorian houses. Around Fisherman's Wharf are brightly colored houseboats and small fish and chip shops. There are pathways along the sea to the Parliament Buildings built in 1898 and the Royal British Columbia Museum, which has historical exhibits. Beacon Hill Park has manicured gardens, a petting farm and panoramic views of the Olympic Mountains.
host_about: I have fallen in love with this way of traveling since I first used Airbnb in 2014. It has always been my dream to own a cabin as a B&B. Now I finally have the opportunity to realize my dream.

name: Bā Bao | Luxury Condo
description:
Welcome to our luxury condo in the Hudson One building, Victoria BC! This 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo is the perfect choice for those looking for a luxurious and comfortable stay in the city. The condo is fully furnished with incredible furniture, making it the perfect home away from home.
The condo boasts stunning views of the city and is located in one of the most sought-after buildings in Victoria.
host_about:
I moved to Victoria via Calgary and Prince Edward Island.  I guess being Island  born (Prince Edward Island) explains why I am so drawn to the ocean..... and this ocean doesn't freeze!   My family moved to Calgary for the  booming economy in 2003. Once I finished high school, I moved to Victoria because I love kiteboarding and spent quite a bit of time in Victoria riding my bike for training camps with my team. There are many great cycling routes and paths to explore.  Whether it be the dense forest, vast ocean, rugged mountains, or vibrant city, Victoria offers everything I admire in a place to call my home. I look forward to sharing my knowledge of the city, whether you are returning to Victoria for business or vacation, or coming for the first time.

I also run a Airbnb in Golden, BC! 
My family bought a "cabin" here in 2007, we have enjoyed years of use at this cabin. Now that our family is getting older, we dont use the cabin as much anymore, but we love sharing it with others! It is located 8km south of Golden, in an ideal location for Mountain Biking, XC skiing, Snowmobiling, Para-Gliding and so many other awesome outdoor activities!

name: The Loft in Vesuvius
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space a 5 minute walk to sunny Vesuvius Bay beach! Enjoy a complimentary bottle of Saltspring Island Kombucha! We also offer SALTSPRING SOAPWORKS products for your use during your stay!
Your private loft offers a full kitchen or ask us about our favourite cafes and restaurants all within a 10 minute drive into town. Weather permitting we can arrange a boat ride ($) and/or a bioluminescence tour via canoe in the bay ($). Come and explore the island!
neighborhood_overview:
Walking distance to famous fish and chips (Mexican Mon-Tues) at the Seaside Restaurant. Vesuvius Cafe (open Wed -Fri). Our loft is a 5 minute stroll to the beach for the prettiest sunsets on the North End.
We are on the bus route or a 10 minute drive into town. Make sure you stop and chat as we are a super friendly neighbourhood!

name: Studio-apt in the heart of Downtown Victoria
description:
Cozy and charming studio in a heritage building in downtown Victoria. Equipped with a full-size fridge, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. Perfect for solo travelers or couples. Within walking distance of restaurants, cafes, shops, and nightlife. Complimentary high-speed internet. Queen-sized bed in a cozy alcove. Enjoy your stay in Victoria in comfort and convenience.
We look forward to hosting you and making your stay in Victoria unforgettable!
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of Victoria, 2-1410 Broad St offers a prime location for travelers looking to explore the city. The neighborhood is bustling and vibrant, with plenty of restaurants, cafes, and shops just a stone's throw away.

One of the biggest attractions in the area is the historic Inner Harbour, which is just a short walk from the studio. Here, visitors can take in stunning views of the ocean and visit popular attractions such as the Royal BC Museum and the BC Legislature Building.

Just down the street from the studio is Market Square, a popular destination for shopping and dining. The square is home to a variety of shops and restaurants, as well as a bustling public market that offers everything from fresh produce to handmade crafts.

The neighborhood is also known for its lively nightlife, with plenty of bars and clubs in the area for those looking to enjoy a night out on the town.

Overall, the Broad St neighborhood is the perfect ba

Rest, relax and restore.

name: The Salty Dog| Oceanfront Getaway + Great View
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and new two-bedroom condo style cottage.

★ Oceanfront
★ Dog Friendly
★ 2 spacious bedrooms
★ A comfortable pull out couch
★ Comfortably sleep 6 guests
★ Private patio
★ Breathtaking taking views of the Port of San Juan
★ 2 full bathrooms

This unit is complete with luxurious furnishings, a full kitchen, and all the comforts of home a very serene space.

** Dog friendly only
** Please note there is new build construction up the road
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. This cottage has neighbours beside and above it. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Misty Haven Suite
description: Escape to our charming garden retreat with a private entrance through lush greenery. Enjoy delightful outdoor dining amidst the enchanting sounds of chirping birds. Immerse yourself in nature's tranquility, embraced by serene forest surroundings. Cozy up around the outdoor firepit with seating. Please note that the  firepit is shared with guests in the main House.
neighborhood_overview:
This neighbourhood boasts convenient proximity to various attractions and destinations in the area. Nature lovers will appreciate being just 3 km away from the stunning Elk Lake and Beaver Lake Park, while garden enthusiasts can explore the beauty of The Buchart Gardens only 6.5 km away. For beach-goers, Island View Beach Regional Park is just 10 km away.

The neighbourhood is also conveniently located for those traveling by air or ferry, with the Victoria International Airport just 15 km away and the Swartz Bay Terminal only 21 km away. And for those looking to explore Victoria's vibrant downtown core, it's just a short 15 km drive away. With its prime location and diverse range of nearby attractions, this neighbourhood is the perfect base for your next adventure on Vancouver Island.
host_about: Both Li and Ian have architectural backgrounds and are former Walt Disney Imagineers

name: The Great Escape - Shirley & BH
description: ‘The Great Escape - Shirley & BH’ is secluded & surrounded by forest.  You will have your own Hot Tub.  The Coach is a 40' luxury Coach that has an electric fireplace, large slide-out, Corian counters, forced air heating & 1 Gbps WiFi.  There’s a propane fire pit, BBQ outside, wood fired pit, with lots of wood.  Has a Queen ‘Sleep Number’ bed, sofa bed and Bunkbeds & sleeps 6.  Has a bathroom, washer & dryer, is fully furnished & equipped.  Bring clothes, food & enjoy The Great Escape - Shirley
neighborhood_overview: TGE-S is a short 14 minute drive to downtown Sooke, with many Parks, Beaches and walking paths close by.  Shirley Delicious is but a 7 minutes away.  Stoked Wood Fired Pizza is an 8 minute drive and French Beach is 9 minutes away.  If you want to surf, Jordon River is only 17  minutes away. 💵 Get 10% off 7 nights or more

👉 Air Conditioning

👉 Saltspring Soapworks products

neighborhood_overview:
Nestled in a serene Colwood neighborhood, Coastal Creative Garden Studio is a perfect vacation rental for golfers, couples, and outdoor enthusiasts.

Surrounded by lush parks, kms of trails, and stunning beaches, the area offers endless opportunities for adventure and exploration.

With Olympic View Golf Club and Bear Mountain Golf Club nearby and a variety of local attractions, this modern and stylish vacation rental is the ideal home-away-from-home for those seeking comfort, convenience, and natural beauty.
host_about:
Owner of Feels Like Home Properties. Check out our reviews online!

I have lived in Victoria with my wife and kids since 2009. We love Airbnb, which means you’ll get high quality service and local recommendations. 

By day, I am a stay-at-home dad and bookkeeper. 
By night, I love to play the drums, mountain bike, hike and read. 

Be sure to ask me about hiking, biking or any of the best tourist spots in the Victoria.

name: Charming Carriage Home
description: This charming one bedroom carriage home is newly built and can accommodate short or longer term stays. The carriage home is situated behind the main house and has a private entrance. The home is located in a quiet residential neighbourhood and close to all major amenities and bus routes; 10 minutes away from downtown Victoria. The suite has modern finishings and an open concept layout that is similar to a micro-condo. Guests are welcome to use the BBQ and patio area during their stay.
neighborhood_overview: A neighbourhood replete with tree-lined streets, grassy boulevards and a variety of housing styles and sizes. Quadra Village is the heart and soul of this venerable community, providing a novel mix of retail, restaurant and service businesses. The village showcases the multi-cultural nature of the community with Caribbean, Dutch, Indian, Greek and Filipino food stores. Topaz Park, Victoria’s most prestigious outdoor sports campus, is also located in this neighbourhood.

description: Bask in the glorious sunshine facing south on a bright day. name: The Rocky Knoll | Garden View | Pet Friendly
description:
The Rocky Knoll cottage in Port Renfrew BC is a charming and cozy retreat nestled in a picturesque setting with a stunning garden view of a rocky knoll. This peaceful and serene location is perfect for those who want to escape the hustle and bustle of city life and enjoy the beauty of nature.

The cottage is pet-friendly, so you can bring your furry friend along to share in the adventure.

Features:
- High Speed Internet
- Gas fireplace
- 2 bar fridges
- DVD Player
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: SuiteVista
description:
SuiteVista is close to Beautiful Mill Hill Park in a quiet neighborhood with a view of mountains and mighty trees. Just a 30 min walk or 6 min drive to Goldstream (the heart of Langford).
Royal Roads University is only a 15 min bike ride away.
The evenings are so peaceful here. During the day you hear the neighboring sounds sometimes but still peaceful most of the time.
SuiteVista was just renovated.
SuiteVista has its own laundry room and an electric fireplace. WiFi, Cable and Parking included.
neighborhood_overview:
SuiteVista is on a hill, so just out of the city hustle, but close enough to walk / bus / drive to The heart of Langford.
Langford is apart of Westshore. So you have access to the ocean, lakes, many restaurants, movie theater, pubs, bowling and many nature trails.

SuiteVista is located up a steep driveway on a steep hill next to a forest. that is why it is so peaceful. Hiking up Mill Hill Park is worth it to see a 360 view of South Vancouver Island and the ocean to the USA.

neighborhood_overview:

Save-On-Foods is 5 minutes from the house and has everything to satisfy your fresh grocery needs. There are a ton of amazing restaurants in the area from all different types of cuisine.

There are some excellent fitness centers, spas, recreation, and outdoor activities that we can recommend to you that are close and in the area. Some great golf courses close by including the beautiful Bear Mountain resort, which is under a 10 min drive from the house.

Some other nearby amenities include Elements Casino, Langford Lanes Bowling, ice-skating, rinks, pools with sauna and spa, and Hatley Castle.

name: Mina&Alice seaside villa
description: Welcome to the seaside vacation home! This independently accessible suite is located on the ground floor of a seaside villa at the eastern end of Victoria. With the vast ocean right outside the window, you can listen to the roaring waves from the terrace or admire the stunning view from the comfort of your quiet and cozy room. Here, you can experience deep relaxation, delight, and surprises. It’s the perfect place for a family vacation. Welcome!
neighborhood_overview:
The property is located in the Ten Mile Point community.

The Ten Mile Point community is located in the eastern part of Victoria, British Columbia, Canada. It is a picturesque residential area known for its scenic beauty. The community is named after its approximately 10-mile (16-kilometer) distance from the city center. Surrounded by nature, it features beautiful beaches, lush forests, and breathtaking ocean views.

Ten Mile Point is renowned for its tranquil and safe environment and is considered one of the upscale residential areas in Victoria. It boasts many luxurious villas and exquisite homes, most of which enjoy magnificent ocean or mountain views. Residents can relax in spacious private gardens or take leisurely walks along peaceful streets while admiring the surrounding natural beauty.

The community is also in close proximity to the University of Victoria, making it an ideal place of residence for faculty and students. There are numerous walking

name: The Time Machine Retro Retreat
description:
This is a one of a kind retro camper creatively converted into a tiny guest house in a private, whimsical garden space.
We are located in a rural residential area near Sooke BC, just off the Galloping Goose Trail. (Km37)
Surrounded by stunning beaches, pristine forest and coastal hikes, refreshing lakes and rivers, wildlife and natural beauty galore. A 30 minute drive from Victoria, or approximately 3 hour bike ride if you’re feeling adventurous.
neighborhood_overview:
The Galloping Goose Trail access is 2 minutes away, and you can hike or bike to Matheson Lake, Roche Cove, or the Sooke Potholes. There are countless gorgeous side trails, creeks, viewpoints and beaches along the way.

You can also drive, bike or walk to:
-Adrenaline Zip Line
-Rush Adventures (SUP/Kayak rentals)
-Stickleback Restaurant
-Sooke Oceanside Brewery
-17 Mile Pub/Liquorstore
-Daniel's Market (Farm Fresh Grocery Store)

There’s a bottomless pit of other local beaches and places to discover if you look up the route from Sooke to Port Renfrew. Check out my guidebook for some recommendations.

name: Stay in historic Rockland
description: Come enjoy your stay in historic Rockland.  The suite is newly built with modern finishes and thoughtful touches.  Enjoy the quiet while being only a few minutes from the city.  Walk to many of the highlights that Victoria has to offer, including Oak Bay Village, Ross Bay, downtown, and many others.   Steps away from Craigdarroch Castle and Government House - take time to wander the beautiful gardens that have something to offer year round.  We can't wait to host you in this beautiful place.
neighborhood_overview:
Located on a rocky escarpment and home to a rich array of heritage homes, a famous castle and Government House, Rockland has a grand, elegant character.

Opulent and historic, the Rockland neighbourhood overlooks the south coast of Vancouver Island and is a mix of heritage homes, condominiums and apartments as many of the larger buildings have been converted to suites. A gardener’s paradise filled with historical attractions, residents work diligently to preserve the lush canopy of many old growth trees in order to retain its elegance and character.

​Upgrade your home base to a holiday highlight.
