A few features of this cottage are:
- Starlink High Speed Internet
- Netflix
- Sports Net
- 2 separate hang out areas in the house
- Outdoor and patio space
- Oceanfront views

*Add to Wishlist
neighborhood_overview:
Cottage strata run community. Cottage neighbours near by.

Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Pair a Dice Cottage - Bottom Unit
description:
This unit is geared towards family and friends. Walk down the stairs to the lower 2 bedroom unit. The bedrooms overlook the firepit and have an ocean view. On a rainy day you can sit on the covered patio to relax and hear the waves crashing. If you have been fishing, there is an outdoor cook pot, to cook your seafood in outside. This unit ha 2 separate bedrooms and a pullout couch.
Also a washer dryer for your convenience, as well as a fully stocked kitchen with condiments.

name: The Point | Hot tub + Sauna+ Panoramic Ocean View!
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway.

Entire home with 180-degree ocean view, wraparound deck & private hot tub and sauna! Situated on a waterfront rise with unrivaled privacy and sweeping 180 degree views of Port of San Juan, the San Juan River and Pacheedaht Beach...The best view in Port Renfrew, hands down!

Well equipped kitchen with everything you'll need- just bring your favourite food to go in the double fridges!

+3 bedrooms,
+Sleeps 7
+High Speed Internet
+Hot tub
+Sauna
neighborhood_overview: The Point is located in Port Renfrew, BC at the mouth of the San Juan River, in the neighbourhood known as Beach Camp. The street is a quiet cul-de-sac which offers a serene getaway while staying close to town. The house is walking distance to both Pacheedaht Beach and Little Beach.

The cabin is centrally located so it is a short walk to either marina, or to the Renfrew pub, Coastal kitchen, or San Juan Store. name: Pair a Dice Cottage - Top Unit
description:
The upper unit is geared towards a romantic getaway, with a fully stocked kitchen with tea, coffee and condiments. Come and enjoy the lovely ocean views - every room has a view but the bathroom! Sit on the deck and enjoy listening to the crashing waves, or walk down to the lower section and enjoy your time at the fire pit. Some sights to see by a short drive are : Avatar grove,
Botanical beach (best to see when the tides out) Fairy lake or Lizard lake.

➞ Breathtaking Views of whales, sea lions, seals and eagles
➞ Private patio
➞ Wood Fire Pit

★ Add us to your Wishbook! ★

name: Red-Cedar Hill Lodge, Woodbine suite
description:
A stay at a Lodge is a unique experience. ​Lodges usually have a comfortable, rustic and spacious feel and are often associated with beautiful natural surroundings and scenic views. This one was custom built to be a memorable bed and breakfast location and serves a continental breakfast. This Lodge is the guest wing of a red-cedar timber frame building. It sits on top of a small mountain on a 15 acre property that borders Matheson Lake Park.

​Upgrade your home base to a holiday highlight.

I'll assume you want privacy unless you reach out and contact me, which I encourage you to do.

name: Private Beach Side Studio Suite
description: Stay in a comfortable and private studio suite with Cadboro Bay beach access! Located in Cadboro Bay and minutes from UVic. Close to a vibrant shopping center with all desired amenities available as well as ocean access to Gyro park. The space includes 1 queen bed, a fully equipped kitchenette, bathroom with shower, towels and amenities, bar table/workspace, smart TV, patio, yard, and parking. Shared laundry available. Great for all business & leisure travellers as well as students!
neighborhood_overview:
Cadboro Bay is a vibrant community with a shopping center that includes local grocery store, coffee shops, hardware store, restaurants, liquor store, transit and more! Peppers Foods is 2 min from the house and has everything to satisfy your fresh grocery needs.

2 min walk from Cadboro Bay beach and Gyro Park. Fantastic ocean views, and an excellent playground and field for children. Park includes parking, picnic tables and public washrooms. If you are lucky, you may catch a glimpse of the mythical Cadboro-saurus.

Under a 10 minute walk or 2 minute drive to the University of Victoria.
host_about:
My name is Patrick, and our team at CleanHost look forward to being your Airbnb host! With 15 years of hospitality experience, we design our spaces with your comfort and experience in mind. We focus on providing our guests with comfortable accommodation with a high focus on value and cleanliness. We ensure fresh linens and a sanitized space for every new guest. We look forward to hosting you and giving you a great guest experience!

Patrick

neighborhood_overview: located in the Wild Coast Cottage community. Neighbouring cottages close by.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Wild Thyme Hideaway
description: This memorable place is anything but ordinary, come stay in our 1963 Double Decker London Bus! Sleep upstairs in a cozy queen bed or relax in the twin reading nook at the front of the bus. Downstairs you will find a full bathroom complete with a claw foot bath. We have an espresso machine,  board games, puzzles and even an outdoor shower! On the deck you will find a BBQ and outdoor fire pit area for relaxing. name: Sunrise Suite
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. Perched on a the cliff of our waterfront property The Sunrise Suite is a spectacular bright and beautiful space with a 20 foot wall of windows overlooking both forest and a partial water. It feels like being in a tree house! You are in the raw rainforest yet in an elegantly eclectic set up suite that our guests feel so cozy and at home in. Far from any main roads, the silence is incredibly soothing. It is the perfect place to rest and restore.
neighborhood_overview: The Terrain is rugged and raw, we are in the rainforest, it is not suitable for anyone with mobility issues.We are nestled on a cliff on the waters edge across from Salt Spring Island surrounded by both young and some large old forest trees., with a creek running through our property. Where we are is rural so you will need a vehicle to see the sites and experience what Galiano has to offer in terms of hikes, shops, art galleries  and restaurants.
host_about: I have travelled around the world which has given me a broad perception of life in general. Every culture I encountered has enriched my life immeasurably. I align myself in grounded spirituality, I have a fun sense of humour, I can laugh at myself easily and am always open to discover things about myself I didn’t know. My motto is that no matter what I encounter in life I can learn and grow. For me life is a grand adventure of discovery.

name: West Coast Cottage: Hot Tub, Beaches, and Serenity
description: Discover your perfect West Coast escape at our cottage, nestled on a private acre in Shirley. Unwind in your private hot tub, relax on the patio, or explore nearby beaches like French, China, and Mystic. With lush trails and old-growth forests at your doorstep, this is the perfect spot for a peaceful retreat or an active getaway. Located just 15 minutes from Sooke and 1 hour from Victoria, it’s the ideal base for your next adventure.
neighborhood_overview:
Explore the Beauty of Shirley and Beyond

Just a 7-minute walk from the cottage, discover French Beach, where soft sands meet the stunning waves of the Pacific Ocean. Within a short drive, you’ll find other breathtaking beaches like China Beach, Sandcut Beach, and Mystic Beach, each 15–20 minutes away. For a refreshing dip or scenic hike, visit the Sooke Potholes, just a 20-minute drive, offering trails and river swimming.

Adventure awaits nearby with fishing charters and whale-watching tours. If you love hiking or surfing, the Juan de Fuca and West Coast trails, starting in Jordan River, provide world-class outdoor experiences, all within a short drive.

Satisfy your taste buds at amazing local restaurants just 5 minutes away. Stoked Pizza serves fabulous pizzas, fresh salads, and great coffee (takeout available). Shirley Delicious offers a cozy spot for breakfast or lunch, and Point No Point delivers gourmet, candlelit dinners with stunning ocean views—
host_about:
We are an international family living between the South of France and Canada and travelling widely. We are bilingual/trilingual. English/French/Italian.
We also enjoy the Canadian west coast living. We love hiking, swimming, and yoga.
We are delighted to welcome you to either our cedar cottage on Vancouver Island, or our Provencal home in the South of France. We love being Airbnb hosts because it means we get to share our favourite places, inside knowledge and beautiful spaces with our guests. Please don't hesitate to contact us during your stay if you need to know anything. We love to be able to make your stay memorable and special, by passing on our local knowledge!

name: Incredible Views! Luxe Penthouse Downtown Victoria
description:
90 DAYS MINIMUM RENTAL

Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located Penthouse

This unit has high ceilings and a Massive patio offering amazing Sunsets and Surreal views of the Ocean and Mountains, overlooking downtown Victoria.

Recently refurnished and renovated as of Feb 2022, everything in this unit is brand new and has yet used.

If you are here on business or simply searching for a peaceful getaway, this is the perfect place to call home during your stay in our Beautiful City.
neighborhood_overview:
Downtown Victoria, British Columbia’s blossoming capital city, comes to life with activity during the warm summer months. Manicured lawns and shrubs line the waterfront, calm waters cradle the hulls of boats stored along the docks, and historic stone buildings create a picture-perfect postcard for visitors. Victoria is an unforgettable city to visit at any time of the year, but during the summer months it transforms into a tourism mecca. Vendors line the harbourfront causeway, double-decker tour buses circulate the thoroughfares, small crowds gather around street performers, as eager travellers excitedly take photos of the city’s most iconic landmarks. From boutique shops to mouthwatering food trucks and some of the country’s most historically significant landmarks, to see it all truly requires more than one day.

Whether you’re a young adventurer or a relaxed retiree, Victoria is truly a city everyone should add to their travel plans.

name: 1 Bed Condo in DT Vic + parking
description:
Enjoy a local experience at this centrally located place.

In this 440 Sf condo, you will find one queen bed, plus a sofa bed. Maximum 3 people occupancy. Washer and dryer in suite. Underground parking provided.

Located in Victoria city centre. Walking distance to the parliament building, China town, the harbour etc.

Easy access to bars and restaurants from walking distance.
neighborhood_overview: City of Victoria as one of the warmest climates in Canada, please note that our city does have a transient population. Services for the less fortunate are on Pandora street north of Quadra street. I would recommend walking south on Pandora street if you wish to avoid this area, which is easy as all attractions and the downtown core are south of the suite.
host_about:
Hi travellers,

A Victoria local for 8 years. Native-associate, proud mom, and a passionate nature lover.

Vancouver Island is indeed gorgeous. I highly recommend to book a stay for a few days. Downtown is amazing to explore with a mixture of culture, food and sightseeing tours. 

Our family  provides accommodation long-term and short-term to students, travellers, workers, and families in Victoria all the year around.

name: Workstation | 96*Walkscore | Pro Clean | Spacious
description:
90 Day minimum rental.

This bright spacious suite, nestled in downtown Victoria's majestic area, boasts a walk score of 96, placing you minutes from city attractions.

Enjoy sweeping 360° rooftop vistas of the ocean, mountains, Historic District, Chinatown, Antique Row, and enchanting cathedrals.

With a Queen-sized bed and sofa bed, it can comfortably accommodate 4 guests.

The designer living room offers a relaxing retreat after exploring the town, beach, or trails.
neighborhood_overview:
Victoria, British Columbia, is a picturesque gem nestled on the southern tip of Vancouver Island, Canada. As the capital city of British Columbia, Victoria effortlessly blends old-world charm with modern vibrancy, creating an enchanting destination for tourists.

One of Victoria's most captivating features is its stunning natural beauty. Surrounded by the rugged coastline of the Pacific Ocean and lush, verdant landscapes, the city boasts an array of outdoor activities and scenic vistas. From leisurely strolls along the picturesque Inner Harbour to exhilarating whale watching tours in the Salish Sea, there's no shortage of opportunities to immerse yourself in nature's splendor.

Victoria's rich history is evident throughout the city, with its well-preserved heritage architecture, including grand Victorian-era buildings, quaint cobblestone streets, and charming heritage homes. Visitors can explore historic landmarks such as the iconic Fairmont Empress Hotel, the majes

Welcome to the serene and inviting neighborhood of Shelbourne Valley, your picturesque retreat in Victoria, BC. Nestled in an area known for its blend of accessibility and natural beauty, your stay promises to be both convenient and enchanting.

Adjacent to your accommodation, the Hillside Shopping Center offers a diverse range of shopping and dining options. From local boutiques to well-known international brands, and a variety of cafes and restaurants, everything you need is just a short walk away.

The Shelbourne Valley is not just about urban conveniences; it's also a stone's throw from beautiful green spaces and recreational areas. Stunning Patio main level Guest Suite located on the west coast of beautiful Vancouver island.

Being our guest, you’ll be walking distance to Lakes, trails, shopping centres & restaurants and just a 15-20 min drive to Downtown Victoria. Staying just 5-10 minutes from most beaches, hiking trails, and waterfalls. Located a 2 minute walk from bus stop. Take a quick stroll to Florence lake just 3 minutes away or visit nearby golf clubs and stadiums. Electric car charger available enquire for rates

name: Dog friendly room with TV and Fridge
description: Easy access for pets by the patio doors to the lawn and back yard on the lower level. Please notice the pet fee for extra cleaning time etc. Surrounded by fruit trees and backed onto Swan Lake Christmas Hill Nature Sanctuary, a Saanich Park green space at this peaceful and centrally located place. The shared bathroom is upstairs.
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is usually very lush and green with many trees and flowers and birds that come to our sundeck. We are only a few blocks from Uptown Mall, Whole Foods, Walmart with Medical Clinic, Tim Hortons Donut Shop, Subway Sandwiches, Shoppers Drug Mart and Saanich Plaza with the Medical Clinic. You can walk on the Galloping Goose trail to Swan Lake with many different birds and flowers along the way.
host_about:
Helping people learn about Victoria, healthy living, organic food, trying some gluten free recipes and others, plus vitamins.  I like to cook healthy food to keep me energetic.  We love to learn about all the corners of the world over the dinner table. 

We currently have several rooms for homestay students.  Please book as soon as possible. The rooms book up very quickly because the students tell their friends or bring them over and they want to move in as well.

We are only 3 minutes walk down two blocks to the bus, and it is only 10 minutes on the bus to town. We have a beautiful 45 minute hike around Swan Lake just outside our front window. We have shopping within walking distance, a couple of blocks down at the brand new Uptown Mall.

name: Wild Beauty Full Cottage|Ocean view |Port Renfrew
description:
Enjoy Breathtaking Panoramic Views from our Luxury Cottage. The famous West Coast Trail & San Juan Inlet, will inspire you from our large heated upper deck! Whether you come to explore the incredible hiking trails, fish for halibut & salmon or just to get away from it all, you will love this home away from home. We have brought luxury, comfort and adventure all together at Wild Beauty Cottage.

- Gas Fire Place and Stove
- Ocean view
- Pet Friendly
- 2 hang out spaces

Add us to your *WishList*
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Downtown Victoria Studio - Comfy and Convenient
description: (30 Day Minimum) Welcome to our cozy retreat in the heart of Victoria! This charming studio apartment offers a warm and inviting atmosphere. With a comfy and cozy design, a private patio to enjoy your morning coffee, and a small but fully equipped kitchen with essentials. Situated in downtown Victoria, you’ll be within walking distance of the city’s best attractions, restaurants, and shops. Ideal for business or leisure visits with a blend of comfort and convenience!
neighborhood_overview: Our studio is perfectly situated in the vibrant heart of downtown Victoria, offering easy access to the city's most iconic attractions. Just steps away from the picturesque Inner Harbour, you'll find yourself surrounded by historic landmarks, charming shops, and a diverse selection of restaurants and cafes. The Royal BC Museum, the stunning British Columbia Parliament Buildings, and the bustling waterfront are all within a short stroll. This prime location provides a perfect blend of urban convenience and scenic beauty, making it an ideal base for exploring everything Victoria has to offer. Enjoy the best of the city from this unbeatable downtown location!
host_about: My name is Jordan, I am a junior hockey player and full time business student at the University of British Columbia. As an Airbnb host, my goal is to give each and every guest an authentic but also luxurious rental home experience while visiting the city I was so fortunate to grow up in, Vancouver BC. I truly believe the homes I host are some of the best places to reside while exploring beautiful Vancouver. description: (30 day minimum) Welcome to our cozy retreat in the heart of Victoria! This charming 1 br apartment offers a warm and inviting atmosphere. With a comfy and cozy design, a private patio to enjoy your morning coffee, and a small but fully equipped kitchen with essentials. Situated in downtown Victoria, you’ll be within walking distance of the city’s best attractions, restaurants, and shops. Ideal for business or leisure visits with a blend of comfort and convenience!
neighborhood_overview: Our 1 bedroom unit is perfectly situated in the vibrant heart of downtown Victoria, offering easy access to the city's most iconic attractions. Just steps away from the picturesque Inner Harbour, you'll find yourself surrounded by historic landmarks, charming shops, and a diverse selection of restaurants and cafes. The Royal BC Museum, the stunning British Columbia Parliament Buildings, and the bustling waterfront are all within a short stroll. This prime location provides a perfect blend of urban convenience and scenic beauty, making it an ideal base for exploring everything Victoria has to offer. Enjoy the best of the city from this unbeatable downtown location!
host_about: My name is Jordan, I am a junior hockey player and full time business student at the University of British Columbia. As an Airbnb host, my goal is to give each and every guest an authentic but also luxurious rental home experience while visiting the city I was so fortunate to grow up in, Vancouver BC. I truly believe the homes I host are some of the best places to reside while exploring beautiful Vancouver. A few things I enjoy are being with friends, exercising, eating great food,  being outside, and hosting an outstanding Airbnb business!

name: JDF Waystation Cabin
description: The JDF Way Station is a private cabin located in the Wild Coast Cottages development that sleeps up to 4 guests with one queen bed in the bedroom and a sofa pullout.  An open living space with exposed beams, equipped kitchen, full bath, WIFI, gas BBQ, wood-burning fire pit, and cozy wraparound deck, bring all the comforts of home with a touch of rustic escape. Walking distance to restaurants, cafes, marinas, and remote beaches, let this be a haven for your escape. Pet friendly.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a the Wild Coast Cottage community. There are neighbours close by. Privacy may be limited in outdoor areas.

Please note that each cottage in the neighbourhood is privately owned. If you visit at another cottage and bring dishes, chairs etc. please be sure to return them to their original cottage. Some cottages are rented like ours, but most are used only by their owners and families. Please be respectful of their privacy and property.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.

name: Tiny Living, Big Adventures!
description:
This stand alone tiny home is anything but ordinary. Custom built and designed by the owner of the property utilizing a shipping container. All the comforts of a big home but in a compact size. Let your island adventure begin today!

We are a short walk to the galloping goose trail and a short drive to many grocery stores, large box stores (Costco, Superstore, Walmart) coffee shops mini golf, 10 pin bowling, Boulder House climbing gym, Cineplex Westshore, Starbucks and plenty of restaurants.

Sleeps 7 & non-pet friendly.

name: Convenient Downtown Victoria Apartment-1 bedroom
description: (30 day minimum) Welcome to our cozy retreat in the heart of Victoria! This charming 1 br apartment offers a warm and inviting atmosphere. With a comfy and cozy design, a private patio to enjoy your morning coffee, and a small but fully equipped kitchen with essentials. Situated in downtown Victoria, you’ll be within walking distance of the city’s best attractions, restaurants, and shops. Ideal for business or leisure visits with a blend of comfort and convenience!
neighborhood_overview: Our 1 bedroom unit is perfectly situated in the vibrant heart of downtown Victoria, offering easy access to the city's most iconic attractions. Just steps away from the picturesque Inner Harbour, you'll find yourself surrounded by historic landmarks, charming shops, and a diverse selection of restaurants and cafes. The Royal BC Museum, the stunning British Columbia Parliament Buildings, and the bustling waterfront are all within a short stroll. This prime location provides a perfect blend of urban convenience and scenic beauty, making it an ideal base for exploring everything Victoria has to offer. Enjoy the best of the city from this unbeatable downtown location!
host_about: My name is Jordan, I am a junior hockey player and full time business student at the University of British Columbia. As an Airbnb host, my goal is to give each and every guest an authentic but also luxurious rental home experience while visiting the city I was so fortunate to grow up in, Vancouver BC. I truly believe the homes I host are some of the best places to reside while exploring beautiful Vancouver. A few things I enjoy are being with friends, exercising, eating great food,  being outside, and hosting an outstanding Airbnb business!

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Harris Green in downtown Victoria, BC! 🌟

Harris Green is the most walkable neighborhood in Victoria with 2,051 residents.

Harris Green has excellent public transportation and is a biker’s paradise.

Nearby neighborhoods: North Park, Fairfield, Fernwood, Rockland, Hillside - Quadra, James Bay and Oaklands.

This unique neighborhood has so much to offer.
Neighborhood Highlights
Charming Spots: Discover local coffee shops, bakeries, and restaurants.
Historic Sites: Within a 20-minute walk, visit Craigdarroch Castle, the Greater Victoria Art Gallery, the Provincial Museum, Beacon Hill Park, and Government House with its beautiful walking trails and rose gardens.
Cultural Gems: Check out the BC Museum and IMAX, and take a stroll through The Fairmont Empress Hotel and our Art Gallery.
Getting Around

host_about: I was lucky enough to be born in beautiful Victoria, BC. Keeping active is a goal of mine (e.g., ski, skate, climb, and hike). Anytime is the right time for tea time.

name: Wild Beauty A | Sleep 2 Oceanview pet friendly
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.
host_about:
Ken and Joy embarked on the journey of purchasing Handsome Dan’s from Handsome Dan and The French Girl in the summer of 2020 amongst all the chaos of covid-19. 

They were looking for a business they could call their own and benefit from all their hard work and ideas instead of seeing CEO’s and upper office management always reaping the rewards, while telling other managers and workers they needed to cut back, or there were no bonuses for the year. 

The journey here was not easy - they spent 6 months apart while trying to sell their house in Saskatchewan, and then in late April 2021 they got some wonderful news - their current tenant insurer in BC said they would cover a landlord policy for a house in SK. 

In May 2021 Ken gave away or had to throw away 98% of the household items they had collected over the years - since they were moving from a huge house in SK just over 3000 sq ft with an extra wide 2 car garage into a less than 650 sq. Ft basement suite in BC. 

The transition of purchasing Handsome Dan’s and moving halfway across the country during a pandemic none the less wasn’t the easiest but they got through and now they are excited to expand and build Handsome Dan’s vacation rental property management in Port Renfrew and across the island to help cottage owners see a return on their investment, and for guests to have an amazing experience from the time they book their vacation till the time they leave; and even after raving about the experience they had at a Handsome Dan property. 

Port Renfrew is a favourite destination for a day or overnight trip on Vancouver Island. Each visit, no matter what time of year you are consumed by the natural majesty of this little community and the breath taking earthly beauty that surrounds it. 

We invite you to stay in our cottages and enjoy a few days, or weeks any time of the year. There is much to do and see. Or simply do nothing for extended periods of time, but sit quietly and listen to the ocean.  All of the cottages are privately owned and decorated to the taste of the owners.  We invite you to check them  out and are excited to share this special place with you.
